loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fruit & vegetables

loans.name: Las Musas Group

texts.es: Al grupo solidario Las Musas, lo integran tres mujeres emprendedoras, esforzadas por el bienestar de su familia. Quien lo coordina es Lina una mujer laboriosas que a sus 43 años, soltera, tiene el espíritu de seguir trabajando para seguir mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia, es propietaria de una librería en su domicilio, cuenta con cuatro años de experiencia, y es el séptimo ciclo que ADIM le brinda sus financiamiento, el crédito actual lo solicita para la compra de cuadernos universitarios de cinco materias, cuadernos de una materia, block rayado, block sin raya, cartulinas, fomy, caja de lapiceros, cajas de lápices, cajas de borradores, etc. El resto de las integrantes son las señoras, Brenda quien tiene la edad de 30 años y se dedica a la comercialización de ropa de segunda en comunidades cercanas a su domicilio desde hace quince años, y Guadalupe de 54 años de edad comerciante de ropa, y además ofrece el servicio de venta de sopa los días domingo desde hace veinte años.
texts.en:
Las Musas Communal Bank is made up of three enterprising women who work hard for the well-being of their families.

Lina, 43, is the coordinator.  She's a hardworking single woman with the energy to keep on working to improve her family's living conditions.  She's the owner of a bookstore in her home and has four years of experience.  This is the seventh loan cycle in which ADIM has given her a loan.

She's requesting the current loan to buy 5-subject notebooks, 1-subject notebooks, lined pads, plain pads, poster board, foam, a box of pens, a box of pencils, boxes of erasers, and so forth.

The other members are Brenda, 30, who has earned a living for 15 years selling second-hand clothing in communities near her home, and Guadalupe, 54, who has sold clothing and also has sold soup on Sundays for 20 years.

loans.use: to buy school supplies because it's one of the seasons of highest demand for these products

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase more new perfumes and accessories to resell

loans.name: Thikra  Al-Hodeidah Group

texts.en:
Thikra Al-Hodeidah is a group consisting of four women, living in Hodeidah city, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB.

Salam is the leader of the group. She is 40 years old and a mother of four children, living with them in humble conditions. Her husband works for a very limited wage, which is not enough to cover the necessary needs of the family. Salam decided to help him and decided to make traditional incense and resell it to the local residents. The income from this business is very small and she wants to expand it, but she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 20,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase some materials to make traditional incense and sell it. Salam hopes to open a store to sell perfumes and incense.

loans.use: To purchase some materials to make traditional incense and sell it.

loans.name: Danny

texts.en: Danny is the father of one who operates a farm, growing and selling bananas to earn a living. He has been in this business for over five years and he earns well for his family. He took a new loan recently from GDMPC microcredit to buy fertilizer and organic pesticides to have an abundant harvest. He plans to expand the farm by having more plots for his banana farm in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and organic pesticides to have an abundant harvest

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer  and new seedlings  to have a more productive farm.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.en:
Tomas grows and harvests a variety of crops on his farm, which he has been doing since he was young. He gets up early to go to the fields where he  oversees his crops.

Tomas requested another loan, which he will use to buy fertilizer and organic pesticides for his farm to have a more productive harvest. He plans to buy a vehicle to use for his transportation from farm to market.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and organic pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn, wood, lime, clothing, and cosmetics in order to meet her customers' needs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase pharmaceutical products

loans.name: Manar

texts.en: Manar is a 22-year-old single lady. Manar goes to the university to study to become a public relations and media manager. She is in her fourth year now. Her father is working in Saudi Arabia. Manar likes to rely on herself.  She decided to apply for a loan to help him pay for the semester fees, and will pay back the loan from the partial work at the university.

loans.use: to pay for her semester fees.

loans.name: Abad Al- Khafji Group

texts.en:
This group is called Abad Al- Khafji. It consists of four women from Sana'a city, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 290,000 YER from AMB.

Jamala is the leader of the group. She is a 59-year-old married woman and a mother of five children, living with her family in a poor area in Sana'a. Her house lacks a refrigerator. Without the refrigerator, Jamal can't keep the drinks, water, and some kinds of food in a cold condition, and they expire quickly. Jamala wants to improve her family's living conditions, but she doesn't have enough money to do. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a new refrigerator for the house. 

Jamala hopes to open a savings account in the bank for her children.

loans.use: To purchase a new refrigerator for the house.

loans.name: Habil

texts.en:
Habil is a 34-year-old married man and has two children. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives in the Bilasuvar Region. Habil is a driver in the settlement. He has also been working in the agriculture sector for eight years. He grows different fruits and vegetables in his garden. His wife helps him in this business too. Every weekend he sells his crops in the local bazaar. He is a hardworking and true man. His monthly profit is 200 AZN. This is not enough profit to provide his family. For this reason he needs a loan to buy seed and fertilizer to increase his business.

If he gets this loan his life will change for the better. Habil applied for 700 AZN from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer to increase his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fuel injection equipment for his vehicles

loans.name: Carla Vanessa

texts.es: CARLA VANESSA: Es originaria de Waspam; es amable y emprendedora, tiene 36 años de edad, casada con tres hijos: Dos  adolescentes que estudian su primaria y un pequeño de 9 meses. Desde hace dos años estableció su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa usada en un tramo en el mercado municipal. Está solicitando su primer préstamo para comprar en Managua cinco pacas mixtas de hogar, de niños, caballeros y damas; lugar donde puede obtener precios más favorables que le permitirá también vender a precios favorable a su clientela en Waspam e incrementar sus ingresos. Ella sueña con mejorar la infraestructura del local donde tiene su negocio, para ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Carla Vanessa is a native of Waspam. She is friendly and entrepreneurial. She is 36 years old. She is married, and she has three children: two teenagers who are in school and a 9-month-old baby. Two years ago, she established a small used clothing sale business at a stall in the local town market. 

She is requesting her first loan to buy five mixed bundles for the home, children, men, and women in Managua, a place where she can obtain better prices. This will allow her to sell at favorable prices to her customers in Waspam and to increase her earnings. She dreams of improving the infrastructure of the space where she has her business in order to offer her customers greater comfort.

loans.use: to buy five mixed bundles for the home, children, men, and women in Managua.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Ghazi

texts.en:
Ghazi is a 22-year-old single man living with his family in Jerash. He is now in his fourth year of university, majoring in Law. 

Ghazi's father is retired from the army, and his pension is not enough to meet both home expenses and university fees. Ghazi is therefore requesting a loan to cover the rest of his semester fees.

loans.use: To pay for his semester fees.

loans.name: Viviana Alexandr

texts.es: A sus 24 años de edad Viviana es una joven trabajadora,  ella  es empleada en un almacén de muebles donde se desempeña de vendedora, Viviana  vive con su madre y un hermano que está estudiando, hace 2 años atrás  Viviana y su madre se pusieron un  pequeño local de venta de  muebles, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de  muebles para ofrecerlos en el local que lo atiende su madre, Viviana aspira que su local quede mas llamativo con mas mercadería y asi logre aumentar sus ventas y sus ingresos para apoyarse en los gastos del hogar y de ser posible le gustaría comprar un local para  que sea propio y ya no pagar arriendo
texts.en:
At 24 years old Viviana is a hardworking youth. She is employed at a furniture store where she is a saleswoman. Viviana lives with her mother and with one brother, who is in school. 2 years ago, Viviana and her mother started a small furniture business. 

She is going to invest the loan in buying furniture to sell at the business that her mom runs. Viviana aims for her business to be more eye catching, with more merchandise, and in that way manage to increase her sales and income to help with the household costs. If it is possible she would like to buy her own locale and to no longer pay rent.

loans.use: to buy furniture.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Ndeye

texts.fr: NDEYE est une nouvelle cliente de l’institution, elle vient de découvrir le guichet qui est à coté de chez elle. Etant à son 1er prêt, elle sollicite ce montant pour acheter de la matière 1ère pour la fabrication de confiture et de la vente de petit déjeuner. Elle s’active depuis plus de 5ans et commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19h. Elle est mariée et mère de famille qui aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes de la famille et les frais de scolarités de ses enfants. A l’avenir, elle voudrait ouvrir un restaurant pour augmenter ses revenus et épargner de l’argent. Ainsi elle pourra améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: NDEYE is a new client at the institution. She just discovered the branch office, which is next to her home. Being on her first loan, she is requesting this amount to purchase some ingredients for making jams and selling breakfasts. She has been active for over five years. Her day starts at 8 AM and ends at 7 PM. She is a married mother who helps out her husband in managing the family’s day-to-day expenses and the children’s school fees. For the future, she would like to open a restaurant to increase her revenues and to save some money. Thus she will be able to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase some ingredients, such as sugar, fruit, and milk for making jams and breakfasts

loans.name: Saber

texts.en: Saber is 42 years old, and lives with his wife and six children in Gaza. He has been working at photography at his studio for eight years. He is one of the affected people from the last war in Gaza. His house was fully destroyed, and he would like to repair it. For these reasons, he has requested a loan from Ryada to start rebuilding the house: walls, windows, doors, and painting work. Saber is very grateful to everyone who helps him. He hopes to be able to get back to his normal life again with his family, and to provide good living conditions for his children.

loans.use: to start rebuilding the house: walls, windows, doors, and painting work.

loans.name: Mavuno Group

texts.fr: Madame CHIBALONZA, célibataire de son état est trésorière du groupe MAVUNO à l’âge de 25 ans. Elle exerce le métier de tailleuse depuis 2005 grâce à l’impulsion familiale. Elle vient de solliciter un crédit qui lui servira à acheter  10 fils à coudre, 10 tissus et 5 pagnes. Elle compte agrandir son entreprise et renforcer sa capacité d’épargner. Elle remercie de vive voix HEKIMA pour le soutien qu’elle apporte aux femmes.
texts.en: Ms. CHIBALONZA, aged 25, is unmarried and the treasurer of the group MAVUNO. She has been in the tailoring trade since 2005, thank to family influences. She just requested a loan to be used to purchase 10 spools of thread, 10 measures of fabrics, and 5 lengths of 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa). She is planning on expanding her enterprise and bolstering her savings capacity. She exclaims her thanks to Hekima for supporting women.

loans.use: to purchase thead, fabrics, and 'pagne' cloth

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is 26 years old, and lives with his wife and three children in Gaza. He has been working as a driver for four years. He is one of the affected people from the last war in Gaza. His house was partly destroyed, and he would like to repair it again.  He has requested a loan from Ryada to purchase cement and other building materials, and also pay for the worker to start working on rebuilding. Mohammad is very grateful to everyone who helps him. He hopes to be able to be back to his normal life again with his family, and to provide good living conditions for his children.

loans.use: to purchase cement and other building materials, and also pay for the worker to start working on rebuilding.

loans.name: Wilman Omero

texts.es:
Wilman tiene 40 años, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa familiar con su cónyuge e hijos, su familia es unida. Vive en una comunidad del distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Wilman se dedica al comercio, principalmente a la venta de pescado como zuco, cachema, etc, con 02 años de experiencia en el sector. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales. El crédito será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de pescado para su negocio, ofreciendo una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, lo que le generará un incremento en sus ingresos, mejorando también su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Wilman is 40 years old and in a common-law relationship.  He lives in the family house with his wife and children.  His family is very close-knit.  

He lives in a community in the district of Cayalti, in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region in the north coast of Peru.  The inhabitants of this district work in agriculture, commerce and the raising of cattle.

Wilman works in commerce, mainly in the sale of fish such as “zuco” (Peruvian branded croaker), “cachema” (Peruvian weakfish) etc.  He has two years of experience in this sector.  He has many good personal and work-related references. 

He will use the loan for the purchase of a greater quantity of fish for his business, offering a greater variety of product to his customers.  This will generate an increase in his income, also improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of fish for his business

loans.name: Luis Gustavo

texts.es:
Luis tiene 23 años de edad, es casado, vive con su cónyuge y su menor hija de 3 años en una casa familiar en el sector de Popan Bajo en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Las actividades principales en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Luis se dedica a la actividad de servicios agrícolas, brinda los servicios de arado y surcado en los predios agrícolas de la zona de Popan y sus zonas anexas. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en el distrito. El presente crédito sera utilizado como capital de trabajo para la compra de un toro para poder realizar mejor sus labores de arado y surcado en los predios agrícolas y de esta manera ser mas eficiente en su trabajo. Esto le permitirá cumplir con la realización de su trabajo brindando un mejor servicio, lo que incrementará sus ingresos, mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Luis, 23, is married and lives with his wife and his youngest daughter, 3, in a family home in the Popan Bajo area of the district of Zaña in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.  The main jobs in this district are in agriculture, ranching, and commerce.

Luis earns a living in agricultural services offering plowing and furrowing on agricultural land in Popan and the adjacent areas.  He has very good personal and work references in the area.

The current loan will be used as working capital to buy a bull to be able to better perform his plowing and furrowing jobs on agricultural lands.  That way he'll be more efficient in his job.

This will allow him to fulfill his job with better service, which will increase his income and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a bull to be able to better perform his plowing and furrowing work on agricultural land

loans.name: Al-Hannan Group

texts.en: Al-Hanan is the same group. It consists of five women and they applied for a second loan of 310,000 YER from Kiva lenders. Amany is the same leader of the first group. Amany applied for a first loan from Kiva lenders to purchase an oven for the house. That first loan helped her very much to improve her family's living conditions. She is very thankful to Kiva lenders for her first loan. Amany didn't yet finish the repayment of the installments of the first loan. She has applied for a concurrent loan of 70,000 YER from AMB to purchase furniture for her house, because her house lacks a lot of furniture. Amany hopes this loan will be financed too.

loans.use: To purchase furniture for her house

loans.name: Ablal ** Group

texts.en:
Ablal ** is a group which consists of four women from Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 290,000 YER from AMB. Abla is the leader of the group. She is a 49-year-old divorced woman and a mother of two children. She works selling perfumes and incense from door to door for a small amount of money, which is not enough to cover the necessary needs of her children. 

The house where she lives with her children lacks of a lot of furniture and most of it is very old. Unfortunately, Abla doesn't have enough money. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase furniture for the house.

Abla hopes to open a large shop to sell all kinds of perfumes and incense to help her make a better future for her children.

loans.use: To purchase furniture for the house.

loans.name: Laura

texts.en:
Laura has been operating her successful retail store for many years, the profits from which have enabled her to support her family and make some home improvements.

Having repaid her previous loan, Laura wants to increase her sales and so has requested a new loan to purchase grains and livestock feeding supplies to sell. She hopes to expand her store in the future by renovating it.

loans.use: to purchase grains and livestock feeding supplies to sell

loans.name: Raul Alejandro

texts.es: Raúl de 25 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida con su negocio de elaboración y venta de pizza  actividad que realiza desde hace 5 años y que le permite salir adelante y apoyar a su madre. Él habita en vivienda propia junto a su madre por lo que se siente feliz de poder apoyarla en su vejez. Raúl desea comprar los materiales para la elaboración de pizza por mayoreo pero no cuenta con la liquidez económica necesaria para realizar la inversión por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: queso, salsa de tomate, harina de trigo, chile verde, cebolla, moldes, etc.
texts.en: Raul, 25 years old, is a hardworking man who earns a living from his business making and selling pizza. He has done this work for 5 years and it allows him to move forward and support his mother. He lives in his own home with his mother for which he is happy to be able to support her in her old age. Raul wishes to buy ingredients wholsesale for making pizza but does not have the necessary financial liquidity to make the investment. This is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in: cheese, tomato sauce, wheat flour, green pepper, onion, pans, etc.

loans.use: to invest in: cheese, tomato sauce, wheat flour, green pepper, onion, pans, etc.

loans.name: Tunzala

texts.en: Tunzala is a 25-year-old married woman with two children. She is an IDP (internally displaced person) living in the Bilasuvar region. Tunzala has land where she grows different kinds of vegetables and crops. She earns additional income from animal husbandry. Tunzala works hard every day beginning  early in the morning, because she has a large family and needs money to provide her family with all the necessary things. She is going to sow her crops, but she has no money to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers. She is asking for a loan of 1,500 AZN to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers. She awaits your mercy. She hopes lenders help her.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Oldalia

texts.en: Oldalia sells copra and charcoal in town and earns well to sustain her living. With her generated revenue, she was able to repay successfully her previous loan used for the business. She likes her business because there is no one doing this kind of business in her village. She took a new loan recently to purchase more coconut shells to produce more volume of charcoal to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to expand her business as well as to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more coconut shells to produce more volume of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en: Aside from her farm, Lilia is engaged in a buy and sell business to make a living. She has repaid successfully her previous loan used for her farm fertilization. She earns well from these activities and was able to make some home improvements from her income. She took a new loan recently to cover the costs for plowing and cultivating her farm for a more productive harvest. She plans to buy farm equipment to be used for farming.

loans.use: to cover the costs for plowing and cultivating her farm for a more productive harvest.

loans.name: Cadili

texts.en: Cadili of Lapinig, Kapatagan, Lanao del Norte helps support her family through her Lampakanay business (lampakanay is a plant that is often used to make baskets). She’s 34 years old and married with one child, and she tries her best to earn money on her own to support her beloved husband and her family. For five years, she has managed this business and earns about 5,000 PHP per month. Recently, she needed additional capital to expand the business and to pay the labor cost of lampakanay growing/harvesting. So, she decided to joined GDMPC microfinance, and fortunately she thanks GDMPC because her loan application of 10,000 PHP was approved. She's so happy continuing her business activity of Lampakanay growing/harvesting. Her future plan is to increase her income and to save for future necessities.

loans.use: to expand her business and to pay the labor cost of lampakanay growing/harvesting

loans.name: Luz

texts.en: Luz, 34 years old, is a single businesswoman. She earns a living of 10,000 PHP a month from selling goods in her retail store. She has been doing this for over two years, and she earns well and improves the business. Her earnings go to her family's daily expenditures. To have more stock to offer, she applied for a loan from GDMPC microcredit for the amount of 25,000 PHP to buy more grocery goods and cookware to sell to raise her profits. She manages her store to generate a bigger income to sustain the family's daily needs, and hopefully, she will be able to increase her savings for future needs.

loans.use: To buy more grocery goods and cookware to sell

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine, her husband and son live in Achajur village of Tavush region. Her daughter is married and lives with her family separately. 

Karine’s son and husband are employed in the construction sphere. 
 
Karine herself is occupied in pig breeding and horticulture.
 
Near the house, they own a plot of land where corn is cultivated. Karine also takes care of their orchard where she grows a large variety of fruit trees (plum, pomegranate, grape, nut, apple and pear). 

Karine’s husband greatly assists her with selling the harvest in the market. 

Realizing how important the farming business is for the family, Karine would like to develop it further. She asks for this loan of USD 1000 to purchase one more mother pig (she currently owns one pig) and special forage for pigs.

loans.use: to purchase one more mother pig (she currently owns one pig) and special forage for pigs

loans.name: Sube

texts.en: Sube is a very supportive wife from San Juan, Panaon, Misamis Occidental Philippines, She is married and blessed with 2 children. She grows bananas and a variety of vegetables. Gardening is a job that she enjoys while earning a living. This is her support to her husband aside from taking good care of their children. Sube gets up early and goes to the fields where she has to oversee her tenants as well as her crops. Her previous loan, which was used for farming, was successfully repaid. She is requesting this loan to purchase organic fertilizers to sustain and to have a better harvest. In the future, Sube wants to have another line of business, a better house and to be able to finish her children's education.

loans.use: To purchase organic fertilizers to sustain and to have a better harvest

loans.name: Marcos Gabriel

texts.es:
Marcos Gabriel tiene 42 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su familia en una zona rural en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los habitantes de esta zona se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

El se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, huevos, menestras, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una congeladora para el adecuado mantenimiento de sus productos, con esto Marcos Gabriel espera tener en mejores condiciones sus productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona lo que le generará mayores ingresos permitiéndole mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Marcos Gabriel is 42 years old. He is single, and he lives with his family in a rural area in the Oyotun district, which belongs to the Chiclayo province, which is located in the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru. The people that live in this area work in agriculture, commerce, and livestock as their primary sources of income. 

He makes a living selling groceries such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, eggs, and dried vegetables, among other things. His business is located in his home. He relies on more than 5 years of experience in this business as well as very good personal and professional references in the area.

He is requesting a loan to buy a freezer so that he can maintain his products properly. With this freezer, Marcos Gabriel hopes to have his products in better conditions in order to meet the diverse needs, requirements, and tastes of the local customers. This way, he will earn a higher income, which will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a freezer so that he can maintain his products properly.

loans.name: Patima

texts.en: Patima's family's main source of income comes from planting and harvesting rice, just enough for consumption. She is married. She's from Lilo-an, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental, Philippines and has been participating in rice production activities in a little area farm only since she was married. She needs to purchase seedlings and organic fertilizers for farming. Patima requested a loan of 10,0000 which was granted by GDMPC microcredit. She happily went home and is excited to start another crop. Her future plans are farming expansion in order to have a better harvest and generate a bigger income to start saving for emergency needs.

loans.use: To purchase seedlings and organic fertilizers for farming rice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase and run two Fresh Life Toilets

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more variety of products

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor tiene 40 años de edad, vive solo en una vivienda de material rústico en la provincia de Jaén. región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en el distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Victor se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cerdos, gallinas, patos, cuyes, etc. con 15 años de experiencia en el sector. El préstamo será utilizado para comprar una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio, como cerdos, gallinas, entre otros. Esto le permitirá mejorar su producción, tener una mayor cantidad de ventas e incrementar sus ganancias, lo que mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Victor is 40 years old and lives alone in a house of rustic material in the province of Jaen, in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern sierra of Peru.  The principal work that is carried out in this district is agriculture, ranching and commerce.

Victor works in the raising and sale of small animals such as pigs, chickens, ducks, guinea pigs etc.  He has 15 years of experience in this sector.  The loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of animals for his business, such as pigs and chickens among others.  This will permit him to improve his production, have a greater quantity of sales and increase his earnings, which will improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals for his business, such as pigs and chickens among others

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the coming semester’s tuition.

loans.name: Cristo Salvador Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Cristo Salvador” conformada por 08 socios responsables y solidarios. Pilar de 23 años de edad es separada con 01 hijo dependiente. Ella  se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza. Así mismo como actividad secundaria se dedica a la venta de golosinas, gracias a su constancia y perseverancia en su negocio puede salir adelante. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de desodorantes, colonias, talcos y perfumes. El deseo de Pilar es ampliar su negocio aumentando el volumen de sus productos. El grupo “Cristo Salvador” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Pilar es la primera del lado derecho y lleva en brazo a su menor hijo.
texts.en: This is the group "Cristo Salvador" ["Christ the Savior"], made up of eight responsible and mutually supportive members. Pilar, 23 years old, is separated and has one dependent child. She sells beauty products. She also sells candy on the side, and thanks to her determination and perseverance in her business, she is able to move forward. The loan she requested will be to buy deodorants, colognes, talc, and perfumes. Pilar wishes to expand her business by increasing the volume of her products. The group "Cristo Salvador" thanks the people who made this loan possible. Pilar is the first person on the right, holding her young son in her arms.

loans.use: to buy deodorants, colognes, talc, and perfumes.

loans.name: Carren

texts.en:
Carren is 34 years old. She is married to William and together they have been blessed with 7 children. 

Carren sells cereals as well as makes charcoal stoves, a business she has done for the last 15 years, earning a monthly income of Kshs. 56,000.

Carren has requested her 1st loan with VisionFund Kenya of Kshs.10,000, which she will add to her capital for making new energy saving charcoal stoves called "jikos".

With the anticipated profits, Carren will be able to increase her stock of cereals as well as plough money back into the jiko business.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are to educate her children.

loans.use: to add capital for making new energy saving charcoal stoves called "jikos"

loans.name: Vinje

texts.en: Piggery is the main source of income of Vinje, a married man with 1 child from Sta. Isabel, Dipolog City, Philippines. For almost 6 years in this business, he has earned 3,000 PHP a month. He needs additional capital for this hog raising business to buy organic feeds and vitamins for his piglets to have better sales. He joined GDMPC just in the last quarter of 2014, and GDMPC granted him a loan amount of 10,000 PHP immediately. As a family man, he wanted to expand his business to improve his family's living condition into a much better one. His future plans are to have regular savings and to finish his child's education.

loans.use: To buy organic feeds and vitamins for his piglets to have better sales.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en: Elsie, 49, is a widow with 5 children from Sta. Isabel, Dipolog City, Philippines. Elsie is operating a sari-sari store business and earns 5,000 PHP a month. She has been operating in this business for 7 years but it still not growing. Recently, in 2014, Elsie joined GDMPC microloan, and her requested loan of 7,000 PHP was granted. She will pursue her business expansion to increase profits with the financial help of GDMPC. She's now selling a new variety of stock at the sari-sari store, such as different kinds of malted milk, shampoo, bath and dish washing soaps, salt, cooking oil, soy sauce, vinegar, seasonings for cooking and toothpaste. Elsie wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to expand her store and to buy additional goods.

loans.name: Zakia

texts.en: Zakia, age 50, is a married woman. She deals in the business of selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, raises them, and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. Zakia needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and availed a Murabaha loan of PKR 25,000 to purchase one more buffalo to expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo to expand her business and income level.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en: Yasmeen, is a 31-year-old married woman. Her husband (also shown in the photo) has been selling vegetables in his locality for many years. He uses the income to support his entire family. Currently, Yasmeen has availed a Murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR for her husband; he used it to purchase more sacks of vegetables, including potatoes, peas, onions, and tomatoes, etc. He hopes the additional inventory will increase his sales to generate a healthier source of income for providing a better standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of vegetables, including potatoes, peas, onions, and tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Manding's Group

texts.fr:
Mise en place le jour de son inauguration, les différents groupes de ce banc villageois sont composés de femmes très dynamiques dans leurs activités génératrices de revenu. Elles sont dans leur majorité dans le petit commerce qui est accompagné de l’agriculture sous pluie depuis plusieurs années. Elles vivent toutes dans le même village et partagent des liens de solidarité très solides. 

Madame Manding (debout à droite avec  une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 49 ans et mère de 02 enfants un garçon et une fille. Elle s’active dans l’achat et la revente de produits agricoles plus particulièrement l’arachide et la patate. Elle achète des sacs les stocke pour la revente à un prix plus intéressant. Elle a une bonne maîtrise de l’activité pour l’avoir pratiqué pendant des années.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 05 à 10 sacs d’arachide  et une dizaine de patate pour la revente.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de mieux assister son mari dans la gestion du foyers surtout des frais scolaires des enfants.
texts.en:
Set up on the day of the inauguration of the banc villageois, the different groups of the banc villageois are made up of women who are very dynamic in their revenue-generating businesses. The majority of the women have been involved in small business, along with rainy-season agriculture, for several years. They all live in the same village and share very solid ties of solidarity.

Ms. Manding (standing to the right with her hand raised) is the star borrower of the group. She is married, 49 years old and the mother of two children, one boy and one girl. She got started in the buying and selling of agricultural products, particularly peanuts and potatoes. She buys some bags of the stock for resale at a good price. She has a good mastery of the business, having run it for years.

With this new loan, she expects to buy five to ten bags of peanuts and a dozen potatoes for resale. The profits will allow her to better help her husband in the management of the household expenses, especially the children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase five to ten bags of peanuts and a dozen of potatoes for resale.

loans.name: Auderico

texts.es:
Auderico tiene 33 años de edad, es casado, vive con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en el distrito de Callayuc, provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La población del distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Auderico se dedica a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de café, con 10 años de experiencia en el sector. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El crédito que solicita será utilizado para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo, lo que le permitirá tener una producción de mejor calidad, satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes. Con esto logrará incrementar sus ingresos, lo cual tendrá un impacto positivo en su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Auderico is 33 years old. He is married, and lives with his spouse and three children in the Callayuc district, in the province of Cutervo, in the Cajamarca region of the northern mountains of Peru. The local population works mainly in agriculture, livestock, and commerce. Auderico works in agriculture, and grows mainly coffee. He has 10 years of experience in this field. He has good personal and work references from the area. The loan that he is requesting will be used to buy manure and fertilizer to maintain his crop, which will allow him to have a better quality product and meet the needs of his customers. In this way he will increase his income, which will have a positive impact on his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to maintain his crop.

loans.name: Zakia Hezyaz Group

texts.en:
This is Zakia Hezyaz’s group, which consists of six women from Sana'a, Yemen. As the leader of the group, Zakia has applied for a loan of 240,000 YER through AMB to be apportioned among its members.

Zakia is fifty years old, married and the mother of three children, all of whom live with her and her husband in a rented house in a poor neighborhood in Sana'a. She is her family’s sole breadwinner, as her husband is unemployed.

Zakia works selling accessories and perfumes door to door. The income from this humble business is very low and not enough to cover the family’s necessary expenses. There is often not enough food in the house for everyone. Zakia will use her portion of this group loan to buy sugar, flour, salt and other groceries to cover this lack.

Zakia hopes one day to have her own house and provide her children with a secure future.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, salt and other groceries for her family

loans.name: Gyulizar

texts.en:
The nice woman in the photo is Gyulizar from Gay village. She lives with her husband and 16-year-old son and her only occupation is agriculture. The farm which she runs with great pleasure and care includes one cow, three calves and a greenhouse. Gyulizar cultivates tomatoes and cucumbers in the summer season and greens during the winter season.

She is asking for this loan to be able to purchase fertilizer for land cultivation and forage for feeding the cattle. As this is Gyulizar’s first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for land cultivation and forage for feeding the cattle

loans.name: Edelyn

texts.en: Edelyn is a woman who stands out for searching for any possible way to obtain a resource that will allow her to feed her family. Several years ago she began making, sewing and repairing clothes and curtains. She thanks God and her clients for this occupation, since the results of these sales have been very rewarding and her products are well liked. Based on this success, Edelyn is asking for a loan to purchase more raw materials like assorted fabric, scissors and other accessories to make more products to sell. She plans to be a supplier of curtains and other products in the market in town to gain more income for the family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more raw materials like assorted fabric, scissors and other accessories to make more products to sell.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana Maria tiene 44 años, es madre soltera, vive en casa propia junto a su hija en en distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La comunidad se dedica principalmente al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

Ella se dedica al servicio de alquiler de habitaciones de su inmueble y a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como cuyes, patos, gallinas, etc. Ana Maria cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de materiales como cemento, madera, pintura, entre otros, para realizar arreglos y mantenimiento de las habitaciones que alquila. Esta inversión le permitirá ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo cual tendrá un gran impacto en su negocio, incrementando sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana Maria is 44 years old, and is a single mother. She lives in her own home with her daughter in the Cayalti district, in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region of the northern coast of Peru. The community works mainly in commerce, agriculture, and livestock. She works at renting out rooms in her home, and raising and selling small animals such as guinea pigs, ducks, chickens, etc. Ana Maria has good personal and work references from the area. The loan will be used to buy materials such as cement, wood, and paint, among other things, to repair and maintain the rooms that she rents. This investment will allow her to provide better service to her customers, which will have a big impact on her business, increasing her income and her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement, wood, and paint, among other things, to repair and maintain the rooms that she rents.

loans.name: La Colonia. Group

texts.es: La colonia es un grupo solidario integrado por cuatro socios emprendedores que solicitan por primera vez el financiamiento para sus negocios en ADIM, con el objetivo de incrementar el capital de trabajo de sus negocios, es coordinado por la joven Karen quien tiene la edad de 19 años, acompañada, se dedica a la comercialización de ropa en su comunidad y trabajadores de una zona franca cercana a su domicilio, este ha sido el negocio que le provee los ingresos para su familia desde hace un año. Cuenta con un buen grupo de socios ellos son, Mariela que tiene la edad de 20 años y su negocio es la comercialización de tamales en el mercado más populoso de la capital desde hace un año, Pedro de 24 años de edad y quien se dedica a la compra-venta de cosechas de frutas en el mercado más populoso de la capital desde hace ocho años, y Joseling quien tiene la edad de 20 años, comerciante de frutas en el mercado de su municipalidad desde hace cuatro años.
texts.en:
The colony is a group made up of four partner entrepreneurs who are seeking their first loan for their businesses through ADIM (AADW: Alternative Association for the Development of Women). They aim to increase the working capital of their businesses. 

The solidarity group is coordinated by Karen, who is 19 years old and has a partner. She makes a living selling clothing in her community and to workers in a free trade zone near her home. This has been the business activity that has provided income for her family for the past year. 

She has a good group of partners. They are: Mariela, 20 years old, who has had her business selling tamales in the busiest market in the capital for one year; Pedro, 24 years of age, who has earned a living buying and selling fruit in the busiest market in the capital for eight years; and Joseling, 20 years old, fruit merchant in her local area for the past four years.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in order to increase her working capital.

loans.name: Manizhabonu

texts.ru: Манижабону 20 летняя жительница городка Курган-Тюбе. Не смотря на свой юный возраст, она уже замужем и имеет одного ребенка. У нее маленький сыночек. Ее мужу 22 года, он предоставляет услуги таксиста. Манижабону более 7 лет работает в салоне красоты. Она предоставляет услуги стилиста, визажиста, также услуги маникюра и педикюра. Манижабону всесторонний специалист. Сейчас она собирается купить новые инструменты для работы, в том числе расчески, средства для укладки волос, косметику (пудра, тени, помада) и разное другое. Для приобретения всех принадлежностей и инструментов она обратилась за кредитом. Манижабону верит и надеется на поддержку с Вашей стороны.
texts.en: Manizhabonu is a 20-year-old resident of Qurgan-Tube. Despite her young age, she is already married and has one child, a small son. Her husband is a 22-year-old taxi driver. Manizhabonu has more than seven years experience working in a beauty salon. She works as a stylist, makeup artist, and nail technician doing manicures and pedicures. Manizhabonu is broadly talented. Now she's going to buy new tools for her job, including combs, hair products, makeup (powder, eye shadow, lipstick) and various other things. She applied for a loan to buy her supplies. Manizhabonu believes in and hopes for support from you.

loans.use: buy tools for work (combs, hair products, makeup).

loans.name: Dilrabo

texts.ru:
Дилрабо деятельная трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 34 лет. Она занимается куплей и продажей зерновых. Свою торговую деятельность Дилрабо начала три года назад. Она в торговле имеет помощника. 
Дилрабо замужем, но ее муж сейчас находится на заработках за пределами страны. Дилрабо живет в своем районе города Худжанд с 8-летним сыном. Ее сын учится в школе. Сама Дилрабо активно занимается бизнесом, чтобы обеспечивать семью. В данный момент Дилрабо обратилась за кредитом для того, чтобы оптом купить партию риса для перепродажи. Благодаря кредиту она сможет расширить бизнес и получить больше дохода. Дилрабо ожидает вашу помощь.
texts.en:
Dilrabo is an active, hardworking, 34-year-old woman. She buys and sells grain. She started this three years ago She has an assistant.

Dilrabo is married, but her husband is working abroad. Dilrabo lives in Khujand with her 8-year old son. Her son goes to school. Dilrabo works in the business to support her family. Dilrabo applied for a loan to buy rice in bulk to resell. Thanks to the loan, she will be able to expand the business and earn more revenue. Dilrabo is expecting your help.

loans.use: buy and sell rice.

loans.name: Segundo Ivan

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 31 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su hija y su cónyuge en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. En este distrito las actividades principales son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Segundo se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado porcino (cerdos) y animales de corral como son gallinas, patos, pavos, etc. cuenta con un corral bien adaptado y amplio para la cría de estos animales. Con más de 06 años de experiencia en el rubro, y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales, compra de alimento balanceado para engorde y compra de materiales como madera, calaminas, entre otros, para el mantenimiento del lugar donde los cría. Esta inversión le permitirá mejorar la producción de su negocio, logrando satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, lo que incrementará sus ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Segundo is 31 years old. He lives with his life partner and his daughter in the district of Pucara, in the province of Jaen, in the Cajamarca region of the northern mountains of Peru. In this district the main activities are agriculture, commerce, and livestock. Segundo works raising and selling pigs and other animals such as chickens, ducks, turkeys, etc. He has a large and well-adapted pen in which to raise his animals. He has more than 6 years of experience in this field, and has good personal and work references from the area. The loan will be used to buy more animals, to buy animal feed, and to buy materials such as wood and corrugated metal to maintain the area where he raises the animals. This investment will allow him to increase production in his business and meet the needs of his customers, which will increase his income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more animals, and to buy materials to maintain the area where he raises the animals.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy ingredients for catering.

loans.name: Alhanna Group

texts.en:
Alhanna is the same group that applied for a loan that was given by Kiva lenders.  This group consists of five women that applied for a second loan of 190,000 YER from Kiva lenders.

Raba'a is the leader of the group. She applied for the first loan to purchase different kinds of fabrics to resell to her customers.  The first loan helped her very much increase her business.  She is very thankful to Kiva lenders for their first loan. 

Raba'a did not complete the first loan and applied for a concurrent loan of 40,000 YER from Kiva lenders to expand her business more through buying different kinds of cosmetics to sell as a side business.  She hopes to be financed with this loan too.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Palla's Group

texts.en: Palla’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Palla works as a farmer to support her family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Zikamo

texts.ru:
Зикамо 45 лет. Она мать одиночка и проживает на районе под названием Вахш вместе с сыном. Зикамо развелась с мужем и сына вырастила одна. У нее 16 летний сын. Он учиться в школе. Зикамо занимается земледелием больше 5 лет. Для нее данная деятельность является единственным источником дохода. Она каждый сезон вместе с сыном сажают урожай. Работать на земле тяжело, но Зикамо несмотря ни на что продолжат работать в этом направлении. Главный человек в ее жизни ее сын, ради него она живет и работает. 
  Зикамо имеет участок земли, где осуществят посев урожая. На 1 га земли она планирует посадить арбуз. Она просит кредит для покупки минеральных удобрений и семян арбуза.
texts.en:
Zikamo is 45 years old. She is a single mother and lives in Vakhsh with her son. Zikamo is divorced from her husband and is raising her son alone. Her son is 16 years old. He is in school. Zikamo has been farming for more than five years. This is her only source of income. Every season, she and her son plant a crop. Working the earth is hard, but Zikamo will continue doing it no matter what. Her son is the most important person in her life, and she lives and works for his sake.

Zikamo has a one hectare field where she plans to plant watermelon. She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and watermelon seeds.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and watermelon seeds.

loans.name: Diana Grabiela

texts.es:
Diana tiene 44 años, es madre soltera, vive en casa propia junto a su hija en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La comunidad se dedica principalmente al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

Ella se dedica al comercio de artículos para el hogar, artículos de bazar como perfumes, artículos de belleza y ropa. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos para su negocio, como ropa, perfumes, entre otros. Con esto Diana espera contar con un mayor stock de productos en su tienda, lo que le permitirá satisfacer los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes, aumentando su nivel de ingresos y con esto su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Diana is 44 years old, and is a single mother. She lives with her daughter in the district of Zana, in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region of the northern mountains of Peru. The community works mainly in commerce, agriculture, and livestock. She works selling household items, and products such as perfume, beauty products, and clothing. She has good personal and work references from the area. The loan will be used to buy a larger quantity of products for her business, such as clothing, perfume, and other items. With this purchase Diana hopes to have a larger stock of products for her business, which will allow her to meet the needs and preferences of her customers. This will increase her income, and improve the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of products for her business, such as clothing, perfume, and other items.

loans.name: Adolatkhon

texts.ru:
Эту умелую мастерицу зовут Адолатхон. Ей 45 лет. Она профессионально занимается швейным делом на протяжении 7 лет. Адолатхон ведет эту деятельность у себя дома. В ходе деятельности она каждый день знакомится и общается с разными людьми и придумывает для их заказов новые фасоны.
Адолатхон родом из района Спитамен, где живет там с мужем, сыном и двумя дочерьми. Адолатхон сейчас думает о развитии своего дела. Она за счет суммы кредита хотела бы приобрести вышивальную машинку для расширения своих сфер услуг. Без вашей поддержки ей не осуществить задуманное. Помогите Адолатхон.
texts.en:
This talented tradeswoman is named Adolatkhon. She is 45 years old. She has been working as a seamstress for more than seven years. Adolatkhon works from home. Every day, she meets and interacts with different people to come up with new styles for their orders.

Adolatkhon is from Spitamen where she lives with her ​​husband, son and two daughters. Adolatkhon is thinking about expanding her business. She would like a loan to buy an embroidery machine to increase her services. She cannot do this without your support. Help Adolatkhon.

loans.use: buy an embroidery machine to expand her sewing business,

loans.name: Candelaria Group

texts.es: Candelaria es un grupo solidario integrado por tres mujeres emprendedoras, quien lo coordina es Ileana una mujer que a sus 66 años de edad, y viuda se esfuerza para brindarle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia, ella se dedica a la comercialización de sandalias en su domicilio desde hace cuatro años, este negocio lo impulsó por medio de la pensión que recibe, es el quinto ciclo que ADIM le brinda el financiamiento para su negocio, con los créditos anteriores ha logrado aumentar los productos ofrecidos aumentando la clientela y por ende sus ingresos, el crédito actual lo solicita para la compra de sandalias altas, sandalias bajas, sandalias de plataforma y sandalias para niñas. El resto de las integrantes son las señoras, María Magdalena de 57 años de edad, comerciante de ropa en su comunidad desde hace seis años, y Erlinda quien tiene la edad de 54 años dedicada a la comercialización de cosméticos AVON desde hace dos años.
texts.en: Candelaria is a solidarity group made up of three enterprising women. The coordinator is Ileana, a widow of 66 years of age, who strives to provide a better life for her family. She has earned a living selling sandals out of her home for the past four years. She started this business using the pension that she receives. This is the fifth loan that ADIM (AADW: Alternative Association for the Development of Women) has provided her business with. With her previous loans she has managed to increase the number of products she sells, thereby increasing clientele and, as a result, her income. She is requesting the current loan for the purchase of high-heeled sandals, flat sandals, platform sandals and sandals for girls. The other members are Mary Magdalene, a 57-year-old clothing merchant in her community for the past six years, and Erlinda, 54 years of age, who has made a living selling AVON cosmetics for the past two years.

loans.use: to purchase sandals in order to meet the current demand for these products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase clothes and perfumes to expand her business

loans.name: Esmeralda Del Jesus

texts.es:
Esmeralda tiene 38 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente. Vive en casa propia de material rústico en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores del distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como chanchos, pavos, patos y gallinas, teniendo como punto de venta el mercado de Morropón, siendo conocida por los pobladores de la zona, con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales. El destino del crédito será para la compra de alimento balanceado para engorde de sus animales, con esto Esmeralda espera mejorar la productividad de su negocio para lograr satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Esmeralda is 38 years old, and lives with her life partner. She lives in her own home made from rustic materials in the province of Morropon, in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru. The residents of this district work in agriculture, livestock, and commerce. She works raising and selling small animals such as pigs, turkeys, ducks, and chickens in the market in Morropon. She is known by residents in the area, and has good personal and work references from them. The loan will be used to buy animal feed for her animals. With this purchase Esmeralda hope to increase the productivity of her business and meet the needs of her clients, and to increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for her animals.

loans.name: Edin Fran

texts.es:
Edin tiene 22 años de edad, es padre soltero, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa familiar en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La población del distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de jornalería (siembra y cosecha de cultivos), con 08 años de experiencia en el rubro y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para invertir en activo fijo para su negocio, como la compra de herramientas (hachas, palas, martillos, sogas, entre otros) y el mantenimiento de estas, lo que le permitirá tener en mejores condiciones sus herramientas de trabajo y brindar un mejor servicio, satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes. Con esto incrementará sus ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Edin is 22 years old, is a single father, with a son under his care. He lives with his family in the district of Oyotún, in the province of Chiclayo, the region  Lambayeque, in the northern coast of Peru. The people of the district are dedicated mainly to agriculture and animal husbandry. He works offering services as a daily laborer (sowing and harvesting crops), with 8 years of experience in the business and with very good personal references and work in the area. The loan will be used to invest in fixed assets for his business, such as the purchase of tools (axes, shovels, hammers, and rope, among others) and their maintenance, which will allow him to keep his tools in better working condition and offer a better service to satisfy the need of his clients. With this he will increase his income and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: The loan will be used to invest in fixed assets, like the purchase of tools (axes, shovels, hammers, ropes) and their maintenance.

loans.name: Oysoat

texts.ru: Ойсоат серьезный и ответственный человек. Ей 56 лет. Она носит статус жены и матери. У Ойсоат сын и две дочки. Дети учатся в средней школе. Муж занимается земледелием. Ойсоат 5 лет назад решила освоить деятельность мужа и идти по его стопам. Она сейчас тоже занимается растениеводством. У нее имеется не большой участок земли рядом с домом. В течение 5 лет Ойсоат постоянно сажает урожай. В этом году она хочет посадить урожай люцерны. И активно готовится к посеву. Ойсоат на заемные деньги решила купить семена люцерны и минеральные удобрения. У нее не получилось собрать достаточную сумму денег для приобретения средств для посева и у нее вся надежда остается на кредит.
texts.en: Oysoat is a serious and responsible person. She is 56 years old. She is a wife and mother. Oysoat has a son and two daughters. Her children are in high school. Her husband farms. Five years ago, Oysoat decided follow in her husband's footsteps and take up farming. She now also works in agriculture. She has a small plot of land next to the house. For the last five years, Oysoat has been constantly planting crops. This year, she wants to plant alfalfa, and is actively preparing for planting. Oysoat has decided to borrow money to buy alfalfa seeds and fertilizers. She could not raise enough money for planting, so taking out a loan is her only hope.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and alfalfa seeds.

loans.name: Rahta Group

texts.en: Rahta’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Rahta works as farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help group members to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time on collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter

loans.name: Kheng's Group

texts.en: Kheng’s group lives in a rural village in Phnom Penh province in Cambodia. Kheng makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as tailor to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men and woman to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

loans.name: Khemsal's Group

texts.en: Khemsal’s group lives in a rural village in Phnom Penh province in Cambodia. Khemsal makes a living cultivating rice, and he also does extra work as a tailor to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

loans.name: Ren's Group

texts.en: Norn’s group lives in a rural village in Phnom Penh province in Cambodia. Norn makes a living cultivating rice and he does extra work as director of primary school and as a construction worker to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

loans.name: Neli Victoria

texts.es:
Neli tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos. Vive en una casa de material noble en el distrito de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio y cuentan con servicios básicos como agua y luz.

Neli se dedica a la venta de animales menores como patos, cuyes y gallinas, teniendo como punto de venta el mercado de Morropón. Cuenta con 7 meses de antigüedad en el negocio, siendo conocida por pobladores de la zona y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en el distrito. El crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para engorde de estos. Con esta inversión Neli espera aumentar su producción y mejorar la calidad de la misma, lo que le permitirá satisfacer los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes, teniendo una gran influencia en su nivel de ingresos, aumentando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Neli is 25 years old.  She is single and doesn’t have any kids.  She lives in a well-built house in the Morropón district, Piura region, on the northern coast of Perú.  The people in this area work in agriculture, ranching, and trade; they have basic utilities such as water and electricity.

Neli works selling small animals such as ducks, guinea pigs, and chickens, with the Morropón market being her point of sales.  She has been doing this business for seven months.  She is well known by the people in this area, with really good personal and professional references.  Her loan will be for the purchase of a greater number of animals for her business, as well as the purchase of balanced feed to fatten them.  With this investment Neli hopes to increase her production and improve its quality as well, which will allow her to meet the tastes and needs of her customers.  It will have a big influence on her income level, increasing her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals for her business, as well as balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase consumable products and corn to make snacks and tortillas to sell.

loans.name: Remigio

texts.es:
Remigio tiene 46 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus 04 hijos en el distrito de San Felipe, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. En dicho distrito sus actividades principales son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Remigio se dedica a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de café, cuenta con fincas de café en buen estado, además se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el rubro, además de contar con muy buenas refrencias personales y laborales en el distrito. El destino del crédito será para invertir en el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café con la compra de fertilizantes y abonos que le permitirán aumentar la calidad de su cultivo, con lo que tendrá una mejor producción que ofrecer a sus clientes, aumentando su nivel de ingresos y con esto mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Remigio is 46 years old, in a common law marraige and lives with his spouse and their 4 children in the San Felipe district of the Jaen province in the Cajamarca region of the northern ranges of Peru. The principal activities in this district are agriculture, trade and raising cattle.

Remigio earns a living from farming, mainly the cultivation of coffee. He has coffee plantations in good condition. He also works raising cattle for beef. He has more than 10 years of experience in this sector in addition to having very good personal and work references in the district. 

The loan will be used to invest in maintaining his coffee plantation by purchasing manure and fertilizer which will allow him to increase the quality of his crop. This will give him better production to offer his customers, increasing his level of income and with this, improving his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in maintaining his coffee plantation by purchasing manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en:
Ellen is 34 year old woman from Dulag, Leyte, in the Philippines.  She earns a living by operating a pedicab, locally known as pot-pot, similar to the pedicabs in other countries.  However, instead of having the bike in the front, it is located at the left side while the passenger carrier is located at the right side.  The maximum number of passengers on a pot-pot is only 2, excluding the driver.  Aside from operating a pedicab, she also engages in a fish vending business selling fresh fish to the people in her community.

She is asking for a loan to buy a side car for the motorcycle, foam for fish storage, and additional stock of fish.  With these additions, her livelihood will begin to operate.  These will help improve her earnings and allow her to save and roll back her capital.

She hopes that her current business will be more productive, to one day have a child that her struggles and hard work are intended for, and also allow her to improve her status of living.

loans.use: to buy a side car for her motorcycle, foam for fish storage, and additional stock of fish.

loans.name: Heriqnaz

texts.en: Heriqnaz is involved in horticulture. She has some hectares of land near the house where she lives with her family. There, Heriqnaz cultivates potatoes, tomatoes, cabbage, and eggplant. Heriqnaz’s husband has agro-machinery (plow, drill) with which he provides different rental services for the work of sowing in neighboring villages. To enlarge their farming business, Heriqnaz asks for this loan. She wants to purchase potato seeds (300 kgs) and fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds (300 kgs) and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add float for her money transfer business

loans.name: Ruzan

texts.en:
Ruzan is widow and lives with her son, daughter-in-law and little grandson. Ruzan is involved in horticulture. Specifically, she cultivates greens, flowers, cabbage, cucumber, potato and haricot. She also owns a greenhouse where she cultivates tomato. Ruzan’s son helps to sell the gathered products locally. 

Ruzan now asks for this loan to be able to improve her farm. She wants to purchase a polyethylene cover for the greenhouse, and potato seeds, and to cover cultivation costs and fertilizer. 

Ruzan, with good credit history behind her, relies on lenders’ support and trust, and ensures responsible repayments of the loan.

loans.use: to purchase a polyethylene cover for the greenhouse and potato seeds, and to cover cultivation costs and fertilizer

loans.name: Marine

texts.en:
Marine is an experienced farmer from Vosketap village, in the Ararat region of Armenia. She lives with her elderly retired mother and 16-year-old son.

Marine is an enthusiastic and hard-working woman who does her best to provide good living conditions for her family. Marine keeps livestock of two mother pigs, two piglets, hens and turkeys. She also cultivates wheat and grapes. 

The gathered milk, meat and harvest Marine sells locally and gets income for the family’s living. She asks for this loan to purchase two steers and fodder for cattle. She hopes to receive lenders’ support.

loans.use: to purchase two steers and fodder for cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase stylish and new clothes to resell to his customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase construction material for selling that helps him to expand his business.

loans.name: Ol's Group

texts.en:
Ol’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. 

Ol makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses. This will also save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Kimheak's Group

texts.en: Narin’s group lives in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Narin makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

texts.en: Chantheang’s group lives in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Chantheang makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

loans.name: Yon's Group

texts.en: Yon’s group lives in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Yon makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for the family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy compost for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase milk containers.

loans.name: Heang's Group

texts.en:
Heang’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Heang makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses. This will also save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Miruka is a typical village in Nyamira area of Kenya where around 100 families live, suffering from poverty and malnutrition. Most of the people make their livelihood by working as labourers in the agricultural fields belonging to farmers in neighboring and more distant villages. 

Thomas has been practicing farming on a small inherited piece of land for the past six years. To afford a decent and comfortable life for his parents and siblings, he has been selling milk, eggs, and varieties of food crops from his farmland. To make ends meet and make extra cash, he has been engaging in other small personal businesses. The Nyamira area has high demand for poultry products. Like many farmers from his region, Thomas finds poultry farming very enjoyable, and he stated that the most enjoyable part about poultry farming is “the increased profits I enjoy.” 

His biggest challenge, however, is meeting the demand that is really high. He lacks funds to increase his poultry farming, so he is seeking a loan of 50,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) to buy poultry. Being from a marginalized community, he finds that accessing funds is very challenging. However, through institutions such as Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva, he feels relieved knowing that his dream will be achieved, and he will be able to buy more poultry. 

With the loan, he will be able to provide more eggs and poultry products to his neighbors and to the local market. This will translate to increased profit margins and an improved income level. Being a visionary man, he intends to accumulate more profits and expand his poultry business to other markets. This will increase his income and improve his living conditions. The extra income he will get will be used in fully repaying back the loan, permanently changing his living conditions, and securing the future of his school-going siblings who depend on him for school fees.

loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Binti

texts.en:
Binti is a married woman with three children who attend school. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her monthly expense is food and school fees.

For over three years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door and from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the loan of 30,000 KES that she is requesting she wants to purchase a bale of kids wear clothes for resale so that she can generate income and pay school fees for her children. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a bale of kids wear clothes for resale

loans.name: Santos Enrique

texts.es:
Santos, utilizó el préstamo anterior para adquirir únicamente insumos agrícolas con los que ha podido obtener una cosecha abundante y de mucha calidad.
Está solicitando un nuevo crédito con el que comprará herramientas para trabajar en el campo y pagara obreros que le ayuden a recolectar la cosecha, minimizara el tiempo que lleva realizar dichos trabajos, abastecerá a sus clientes y a su familia con granos básicos.
texts.en:
Santos used the previous loan to buy farming supplies with which he has been able to obtain an abundant and high quality harvest.

He is requesting a new loan with which he will buy tools to work in the field and to pay workers that would help him collect the harvest, minimizing the time it takes to do these jobs, providing basic staples for his customers and his family.

loans.use: to buy tools to work in the field and to pay workers to collect the harvest.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
This is Anna. She is an experienced farmer from Hovtashen village in the Ararat region of Armenia. She lives together with her husband, elderly retired mother-in-law and daughter. Anna’s son currently serves in the army.
