Doña Damaris es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta valerse por sí misma para salir adelante y con sus ingresos ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar, ella se dedica a la  venta de sabanas, edredones y almohadas, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan algo de lo que ella vende, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra todas las semanas. Tiene más 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad la que empezó con el primer cerdito que recibió del grupo. 
Este crédito es para comprar de sabanas, edredones y almohadas. Lleva 2 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos comenzó su negocio. Sus sueños son que su hijo menor sea un profesional.
texts.en:
In the El Progreso fortress of Portoviejo, the communal bank group Las Colinas del Progreso meets every two weeks. This is a marginal urban zone, highly populous, of this city.

Damaris is 42 years old, is in a common-law marriage, and from this relationship has seven children, 6 adults and the youngest is 14 years old, who goes to secondary school. Four of them still live in her house. Her husband is a construction worker. 

Damaris is a woman who fights hard and likes to independently get ahead and, with her income, help her husband with the household expenses. She works selling sheets, bedspreads and pillows. She sells door-to-door and also sells from her house where her customers come when they need something that she sells. She leaves items on credit with her customers and collects each week. She has over two years of doing this work; she began it with her first loan that she got from the group.

This loan is to purchase sheets, bedspreads, and pillows. She has been in the communal bank group for two years and she likes it because with one of the loans she began her business. 

Her dream is that her youngest son becomes a professional.

loans.use: to purchase sheets, bedspreads, and pillows.

loans.name: Luz Amalia

texts.es:
Luz es una madre soltera, campesina a cargo de dos hijos adolescentes de 18 y 15 años de edad, ella tiene un reto enorme y es hacer que sus hijos accedan a una educación superior pues comúnmente los hijos de los campesinos heredan las tierras de sus padres y realizan un ciclo pero Luz no quiere que ellos tengan ese destino por el contrario trabaja duramente entre 11 y 14 horas diarias para que ellos sean quienes elijan sus destinos.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de pollos, gallinas, y cuido para alimentos.
texts.en:
Luz is a single mother, a rural woman with two adolescent children, ages 18 and 15, in her care. She has an enormous challenge and it is to provide her children with a higher education since typically children in the countryside inherit their parents' land and continue a cycle. But Luz doesn't want them to have this destiny, instead she works hard between 11 and 14 hours each day so that they can be who choose their destinies.

She asks for a loan to purchase chickens, hens, and concentrated feed for them.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Leon Dario

texts.es: León es un campesino, sonriente y amante del campo que se dedica a la cría de aves, en la foto se ve el buen ambiente y el cuidado que tiene con sus animales, su motivo de trabajar radica en su gran anhelo de tener una casa propia, comprada por sus propios recursos y seguirá trabajando humildemente para lograr sus objetivos por ello solicita un crédito para la compra  de gallinas y cuido, entre más animales tenga mejores negocios podrá realizar pues será un vendedor a tener en cuenta por los ciudadanos y empresarios que se acercan a comprar.
texts.en: León is from the countryside, is always smiling, and loves rural life. He works raising poultry. In the photo the good environment and care that he has with his animals can be seen. His motivation to work comes from his great desire to have his own house, purchased with his own resources and he will continue to work humbly to achieve his objectives. For this, he asks for a loan to purchase hens and concentrated feed. With more animals, he can do better business, since he will be a salesman to take into account by the people and businesses who approach him to purchase.

loans.use: to purchase hens and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Maria Delia

texts.es: Maria es una carismática, adorable, pero ante todo trabajadora mujer de 65 años de edad, que alterna sus profesiones de cría de cerdos con una tienda donde vende panela, arroz, y dulces, estas actividades no solo le generan el sustento para ella y su familia, si no que la hacen sentir viva y útil que es lo mas importante, y sabe que lo está haciendo muy bien y ahora viene a solicitar su ayuda para la compra de cerdos y cuido para ellos, parte del dinero será para abastecer su tienda que aunque no es muy grande se puede encontrar productos primera necesidad
texts.en: Maria is a charismatic, adorable but, above all, hard-working woman, 65 years old, who alternates her professions of raising pigs with a store where she sells brown sugar, rice, and sweets. These jobs not only generate the sustenance for herself and her family, but also they make her feel alive and useful, which is the most important.  She knows that she is doing it very well and now she comes to ask for your help to purchase pigs and concentrated feed for them. Part of the money will be used to stock her store in which, although it is not very large, one can find staple products.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of staple products, pigs, and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Humberto De Jesus

texts.es:
Humberto un tradicional tendero que lleva una trayectoria de casi 20 años, donde aventurado monto su negocio de venta de refrescos, bebidas, frituras, dulces y productos de primera necesidad. 
Humberto es un hombre casado con dos hijos de 7 y 6 años de edad, por los cuales trabaja y lo inspira cada día a buscar mejores opciones de ingresos. 
Humberto quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de bebidas, refrescos, y surtido en grano y abarrotes, con esta ayuda abastecerá su negocio y buscara una mejor calidad de vida para su familia
texts.en:
Humberto, a traditional shopkeeper who has a history of 20 years in this, where he ventured to undertake his business selling soft drinks, drinks, fried snacks, sweets, and staple products.

Humberto is a married man with two children, ages 7 and 6, for whom he works and who inspire him every day to look for better alternatives for income.

Humberto wants to ask for a loan to purchase drinks, soft drinks, and an assortment of grains and groceries, with this help he will stock his business and will seek a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of staple products.

loans.name: Maria Yolanda

texts.es:
Una tienda es una gran bendición en las zonas rurales, que son sectores acostumbrados a cultivar su propio alimento pero ellos también se cansan de comer lo mismo y necesitan otros alimentos, medicamentos y productos de aseo personal, pero para poder acceder a ellos necesitan realizar largos desplazamientos que en muchas ocasiones deben hacer a pie ante la escases de un vehículo. 
Este es un problema que tiene muy identificado la señora Yolanda que a sus 52 años de edad es madre cabeza de familia, y solicita un crédito para comprar un gran surtido de alimentos, desde productos refrigerados, granos, dulces, chocolates, víveres, medicamentos, y productos de aseo personal
texts.en:
A store is a great blessing in the rural areas, which are places used to cultivating their own food but they also become tired of eating the same thing and need other foods, medicines, and personal care products. But to be able to get them, they need to travel long distances which, in many occasions, they have to do on foot due to the scarcity of vehicles.

This is a problem that Yolanda has identified very well.  At 52 years old, she is the female head of the family, and asks for a loan to purchase a wide assortment of foods, from refrigerated products, grains, sweets, chocolates, groceries, medicines and personal care products.

loans.use: to stock with pantry staples a complete store for the good of the rural people.

loans.name: Ahadi Group

texts.fr: La cliente NYASSA est présidente du groupe AHADI à l’âge de 49 ans. Mariée et mère de 9 enfants tous écoliers, elle s’occupe de la vente de farine de maïs depuis 1993 suite au premier fonds de roulement obtenu de son mari. Elle demande un credit qui lui permettra d’acheter 52 sacs de farine de 50kg. Son rêve est d’agrandir son entreprise, payer les frais scolaires de ses enfants, acheter une maison et renforcer sa capacité d’épargner. C’est pourquoi, elle remercie HEKIMA pour son grand soutien.
texts.en:
Nyassa is the president of the Ahadi group and is 49 years old. She is married and a mother of nine children, who all go to school. 

Nyassa has worked selling corn flour since 1993, a business she started from funds that she received from her husband.

She is seeking a loan that will allow her to buy 52 50-kilogram sacs of flour. 

Her dream is to expand her business, pay her children's school fees, buy a house, and increase her savings. This is why she thanks Hekima for their great support.

loans.use: to buy 52 50-kilogram sacs of flour

loans.name: Juan David

texts.es:
Juan David es un joven de 26 años de edad vive con su pareja y se desempeña como ganadero, el cría y engorda al ganado para posteriormente venderlo y se encierra en ese ciclo donde puede pasar largos periodos de tiempo, por ello necesita un buen capital para soportar esas largas temporadas que no recibe dinero.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de ganado de levante, y lo justifica diciendo que ya tiene un ganado casi listo pero que le falta tiempo con el ganado nuevo tendrá un ciclo para mantenerse y pensar ampliarse en un futuro pues son quiere traer hijos hasta tener una economía estable en la cual su descendencia no aguante hambre.
texts.en:
Juan David is a 26-year-old young man who lives with his partner and works as a cattle farmer. He raises and fattens the cattle to later sell them and the cycle is closed, which can take long periods of time. For this, he needs good capital to support these long periods when he doesn't receive money. 

He asks for a loan to purchase young cattle, and he justifies it saying that he has cattle almost ready but that he still has to wait some time. With the new cattle, he will have a cycle to maintain himself and he thinks of expanding in the future since he wants to bring children to have a stable economy in which his descendants won't suffer from hunger.

loans.use: to purchase young cattle, to cover the times with low income.

loans.name: Cinamula Group

texts.fr: Madame YALALA, âgée de 38 ans, mariée et mère de 6 enfants est membre du groupe CINAMULA où elle est présidente. Elle s’occupe de la vente des friperies au marché depuis 1994. Elle vient de demander un crédit  qui lui permettra d’acheter 1 ballon de friperie. Les revenus de son activité l’aidera à agrandir son entreprise et à s’acheter une parcelle. Elle remercie HEKIMA pour ses produits qui aident les femmes à faibles revenus de recevoir de crédit à moindre coût et en toute facilité.
texts.en:
Yalala is 38 years old, married, and a mother of six children. She is a member and the president of the Cinamula group. 

She has worked selling used clothing at a market since 1994. She has just sought a loan that will allow her to buy a bale of used clothing.

Earnings from this business will help her expand her business and buy a piece of land.

She thanks Hekima for their products that help low-income women access credit more easily and at a lower cost.

loans.use: to buy one bale of used clothing

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cereals and condiments

loans.name: Ketty Alexandra

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Las Colinas Del Progreso esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad.
 La señora Ketty tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y fruto de relación tienen dos hijos de 19 y 14 años de edad, los cuales estudian en Universidad y colegio. Su esposo es gasfitero.
Doña Ketty es una mujer que le gusta ganar lo suyo y así no depender de su marido sino mas bien ayudarlo con los gastos que genera el hogar, para esto ella se dedica a la venta de sabanas y toallas,  su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale dos o tres veces por semana a ofrecer sus productos aunque  también vende en la casa, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, lleva más de 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual se gana lo suyo.
Este crédito es para comprar sabanas y toallas. Es socia fundadora del Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque siempre le han ayudado con los créditos. Sus sueños son seguir adelante con su negocio
texts.en:
In the El Progreso fortress of the city of Portoviejo, the communal bank group Las Colinas del Progreso meets every two weeks. This is a marginal urban zone, highly populated, of this city.

Ketty is 39 years old, she is married and from this relationship they have two children, ages 19 and 14, who are university and secondary school students. Her husband is a plumber. 

Ketty is a woman who likes to earn her own money and in this way not depend on her husband, but instead help him with the expenses that the household generates. For this, she works selling sheets and towels. She sells door-to-door, she goes out two or three times per week to offer her products, although she also sells from her house. She leaves the products on credit and collects each week. She has been working in this for more than 2 years, with which she earns her own money. 

This loan is to purchase sheets and towels. She is a founding member of the communal bank group and she likes it because it has always helped her with the loans. Her dreams are to continue onward with her business.

loans.use: to purchase sheets and towels.

loans.name: Janeth Aracely

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Las Colinas Del Progreso esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad.
 La señora Janeth tiene  30 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció y de esta relación tienen cinco hijos de 15, 12, 10, 8 y 6 años de edad, la mayor estudia en colegio y el resto en escuela. Ella vive con la mamá.
Doña Janeth es una muy buena madre que le ha tocado  trabajar duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos,  ella tiene una pequeña granja en la cual se dedica a la cría de pollos, también se dedica a la venta de productos naturales los mismos que vende puerta a puerta, ella también trabaja de chet en un restaurante de la ciudad. Ella hace lo posible para que a sus hijos no les falte nada.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar productos naturales, pollos, alimentos y medicinas para que estos tengan un buen desarrollo. Lleva 8 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y  le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the El Progreso fortress of the city of Portoviejo, the communal bank group Las Colinas del Progreso meets every two weeks. This is a marginal urban zone, highly populated, of this city. 

Janeth is 30 years old, and some years ago, her husband died. From this relationship, they have five children, ages 15, 12, 10, 8 and 6, the oldest is in secondary school and the rest in primary school. She lives with her mother. 

Janeth is a very good mother who has had to work hard to get her children ahead. She has a small farm in which she works raising chickens. She also works selling natural products, which she sells door-to-door. In addition, she works as a chef in a restaurant in the city. She does whatever is possible so that her children don't lack anything. 

This loan will be used to purchase natural products, chickens, and feed and medicines so that they develop well. She has been in the communal bank group for 8 loan cycles and she likes it for the loans that help her a lot. Her dream is to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to purchase natural products, chickens, and chicken feed and medicines.

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.es:
Jacinto tiene 60 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus 02 hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Ferreñafe, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú, donde su población se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

El se dedica al cultivo de café, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo será para invertir en la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café. Con esto Jacinto espera mejorar la productividad de su cultivo lo que le permitirá incrementar su nivel de ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida y a la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jacinto is 60 years old and lives with his wife and 2 children in a rural area of the Ferreñafe district, located in Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru, where the population works in agriculture and ranching as their primary economic activities.

He works growing coffee, a business in which he has more than 10 years of experience. He has regular customers who give him very good personal and work references. 

The loan will be used to invest in the purchase of manure and fertilizers to maintain his coffee crops. With this Jacinto hopes to improve the productivity of his farming, allowing him to increase his earnings and improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers to maintain his coffee crops.

loans.name: Beatriz Elizabeth

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Las Colinas Del Progreso esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad.
 La señora Beatriz tiene  44 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció y de esta relación tienen dos hijos  mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive con ella.
Doña Beatriz es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma para salir adelante, ella   tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa donde vende productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, frutas y legumbres carnes, pescado, cosas de bazar entre otras cosas, sus clientes consiguen de todo por eso es que su clientela se mantiene y  aumenta cada día más,  trabaja todos los días desde las 06h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su hijo le ayuda cuando puede, lleva más de 11 años con su tienda con la cual se gana la vida.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, entre otros productos. Esta desde el inicio en el  Grupo de Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son tener buena salud.
texts.en:
In the fortress of El Progreso in the city of Portoviejo, the communal bank group Las Colinas del Progreso meets every two weeks. This is a marginal urban zone, highly populated, of this city.

Beatriz is a woman who likes to independently get ahead; she has a grocery store in her house where she sells products such as rice, sugar, oils, detergent, fruit and vegetables, meats, fish, small items, among others. Her customers get everything and for this her customer base is consistent and increases each day. She works every day from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm and sometimes later. Her son helps when he can. She has had this store for over 11 years, with which she earns a living.

This loan will be used to stock her store more, she will purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergents, among other products. She has been part of the communal bank group from the beginning and she likes it for the help that the loans offer. Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergents and other products.

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is 51 years old and a widow with five children, one of whom in school. Marietta works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell like soap, shampoo, eggs, chips, etc.

Marietta has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future Marietta would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like soap, shampoo, eggs, chips, etc

loans.name: Julie

texts.en:
Julie works hard to support her family. She is married, and has a restaurant business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, spices, eggs, can goods, etc.

Julie has been in this business for 12 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, spices, eggs, canned goods, etc

loans.name: Sol Maria

texts.es:
Ella es Sol, una mujer de 23 años que inicio su negocio de venta de cerdos y pollos, actividad que inicio por necesidad económica, pues en el campo las oportunidades son pocas y para salir adelante necesitas ir a la ciudad. 
Sol quiere seguir con sus raíces e impulsar su negocio para competir con los precios de sus vecinos.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de cerdos y pollos, este crédito tiene un sentido muy especial y es que con el tendrá recursos suficientes para seguir mantenimiento su hogar, que depende netamente de ella incluso para comer un plato de comida. 
Ayuda, esta mujer necesita aun impulso para mejorar su negocio, y tener la oportunidad de ser lo suficiente para levantar a su familia.
texts.en:
Sol, a 23-year-old woman, began her business selling pigs and chickens, work that she began for economic necessity, since in the countryside the opportunities are few and, to get ahead, one needs to go to the city. 

Sol wants to continue with her roots and push her business to compete with her neighbors' prices.

She asks for a loan to purchase pigs and chickens. This loan will have a very special meaning and it is that she will have sufficient resources to continue maintaining her household, which purely depends on her even to have a plate of food. 

Help. This woman still needs a boost to improve her business, and to have the opportunity to be sufficient to raise her family.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and chickens to stock her farm.

loans.name: Abilinia

texts.es:
Abilinia es una mujer especial, es una madre cabeza de familia que saco adelante 3 hijos en una zona tan difícil como lo es el campo. Pero a ella no le dieron pro herencia un cultivo, unos animales, monto su negocio de venta de ropa, accesorios perfumes para hombre y damas.
Este negocio ha ido cogiendo furor ya que no es común ver en el campo un negocio como tal.
El éxito de esto recae en que Abilinia es que confió en la vanidad de sus vecinos y con la ayuda de un crédito que invertirá en la compra de ropa, perfumes y accesorios.
Su objetivo es en unos 5 años tener un gran almacén de ropa y una vivienda propia para disfrutar con sus 3 hijos.
texts.en:
Abilinia is a special woman, she is the female head of the family who got her three children ahead in a the very difficult zone which is the countryside. But no one left her land or any animals. She opened her business selling clothing, accessories and perfumes for men and women.

This business has been been a rage since it is not common to see businesses like this in the countryside.

The success of this lies in that Abilinia trusted the vanity of her neighbors and with the help of a loan which she will invest in purchasing clothing, perfumes and accessories.

Her objective is that in some 5 years, she will have a large clothing store and her own house to enjoy with her three children.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of ladies' and men's clothing, perfumes and accessories to make a clothing store in the countryside.

loans.name: Tươi

texts.en:
Mrs. Tươi operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. Tươi has been involved in this business for five years.

She is 32 years old, and she is married with two children. Tươi lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Tươi's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Tươi faces in her life is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

In the future, Tươi hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet

loans.name: Thêu

texts.en:
Thêu works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Thêu is 60 years old and she is married with three children. Thêu lives  in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Thêu faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Thêu hopes to maintain a successful business, and to build a new house. She hopes for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Onael Rafael

texts.es:
Onael un ganadero que lucha cada día para que sus hijos pueda acceder a una buena educación y a pesar de que tienen 24 y 26 años de edad sigue con la esperanza de que puedan tener un título universitario y sean los primeros profesionales en su familia. 
Onael pensando en generar mejores recursos para enviar sus hijos a la capital a estudiar, quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de ganado que criara y posteriormente venderá, su objetivo es dejar parte de las ganancias para mandar dinero a sus hijos que serán dos forasteros en un nuevo mundo para ellos.
texts.en:
Onael is a cattle farmer who fights each day so that his children can have a good education and, despite being 24 and 26 years old, he continues with the hope that they will be able to get a university degree and be the first professionals in their family. 

Onael plans to generate more resources to send his children to the capital to study. He wants to ask for a loan to purchase cattle that he will raise and later sell; his objective is to leave part of his earnings to send money to his children who will be foreigners in a new world for them.

loans.use: to purchase young cattle to generate sufficient resources so that his children can study in the city.

loans.name: Edison Alberto

texts.es:
Edison es un hombre casado, maduro y responsable, agricultor por naturaleza, su padre fue quien le trasmitió todas las enseñanzas con las que se formó y ahora tiene un buen campo de cultivo de frutas, pero su mayor inconveniente es que para ver resultados tiene que esperar cosecha y mientras debe sostener sus cultivos y protegerlos de los diferentes depredadores y parásitos que lo aquejan.
Edison solicita un crédito para la compra de abonos, riegos, pesticidas, fungicidas, insumos que serán de vital importancia para el sostenimiento de sus tierras hasta que pueda recoger y vender lo cultivado.
texts.en:
Edison is a married man, mature and responsible, a farmer by nature. His father was who transmitted all the teachings with which he was trained and now he has a good field cultivating fruit. But, his major inconvenience is that to see profits, he has to wait for the harvest and meanwhile he needs to sustain his crops and protect them from the different predators and parasites that afflict them. 

Edison asks for a loan to purchase manure, irrigation, pesticides, fungicides, supplies that will be of vital importance to sustain his land until he is able to harvest and sell his crop.

loans.use: to pay for irrigation, and to purchase pesticides and fungicides.

loans.name: German Antonio

texts.es: German es un joven de 20 años de edad, con deseos de salir adelante y estudiar que genera sus ingresos y no solo eso mejorar sus ingresos para apoyar a su familia, en vista de la falta de capital para abastecer su negocio German quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de grano, abarrotes y productos de aseo, tu ayuda servirá a este joven para seguir con su tienda y salir adelanta en una zona tan difícil como lo es el campo.
texts.en:
German is a 20-year-old young man with desires to get ahead and study, who generates his income and not only this, to increase his income to support his family. In light of the lack of capital to stock his business, German wants to ask for a loan to purchase grains, groceries, and cleaning products. 

Your help will allow this young man to continue with his store and get ahead in such a difficult area as is the countryside.

loans.use: to purchase grains, groceries and cleaning products to stock his business.

loans.name: Doãn

texts.en:
Mr. DOÃN works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. DOÃN has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

DOÃN is 31 years old and he is married with 2 children. He lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is DOÃN'S first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that DOÃN faces in his life is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With his business profit, DOÃN hopes to maintain a successful business, and to build a new house. He hopes for his business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Linda is 45 years old, and from Baybay, Leyte. She is married with three children, ages 10, 14 and 18. Her husband is an OFW (Overseas Foreign Worker). She sacrifices on raising her children alone so that he can provide for them. On the other hand, Linda also brings home an income by selling rice. This has been her business for two years now. 

She is asking a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy five sacks of rice and retail bags.

Linda hope to expand her business and have more business options to provide for her family's basic needs. 

In the future, she hope that someday she can find another business so she can ask her husband to come home and help her in raising their children and their livelihood.

loans.use: to buy five sacks of rice and retail bags

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es una persona casada de 49 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Sololá junto a sus siete hijos y su esposa. 
Santos para la generación de sus ingresos, él se dedica a la compra y venta de verduras, pues es un oficio que él lo aprendió hace 10 años, por la misma necesidad de mantener a sus hijos, esta actividad lo realiza desde su comunidad y algunas veces en los lugares circunvecinos, es un trabajo muy bonito porque  él compra las verduras por cuerda. 
Santos no solo se dedica a este trabajo, él también cultiva hortalizas, estos dos oficios le ayudan a Santos para generar sus ingresos y apoyar a sus hijos en la escuela, comprarles ropa, y darles de comer cada día. Santos es un padre muy responsable, pues con su esposa han decidido comprar un terreno, que más adelante les servirá para construir más cuartos, para que sus hijos tengan cada quien un espacio donde vivir, Ellos buscan un préstamo, y el uso de este  préstamo es para comprar un terreno  para que más adelante puedan ampliar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Santos, 49, is married and lives in Sololá with his seven children and his wife. He works buying and selling vegetables, something he learned ten years ago because he needed to maintain his children. He mainly works in his community, but sometimes visits also surrounding areas. He does a nice job, since he buys all the vegetables produced in one plot of land.

This is not his only job. Santos also grows vegetables. With these two jobs, he generates enough income to support his children’s education, buy them clothes and feed them. Santos is a very responsible father. He and his wife decided to buy a plot of land, and will build more rooms in the future so that their children can live more comfortably.

They are requesting a loan to buy a plot of land in order to enlarge their house in the future.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

loans.name: Maricela Del Rosario

texts.es: Maricela tiene  31 años de edad y habita junto a sus dos hijos de 12 y 8 años de edad en casa de su madre. Ella trabaja como empleada domestica desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida. Ella desea dar inicio a la construcción de su vivienda por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios para dar inicio a la obra. Con el monto  solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc.
texts.en:
Maricela is 31 years old and lives in her mother's house with her two sons who are 12 and 8 years old. 

For many years she has been making a living working as a housekeeper.

She hopes to start building her own house which is why she made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI. She will invest the money in buying the materials needed to make a start on the job. 

With the amount she had requested she will buy cement, sand, bricks and iron etc.

loans.use: to buy: cement, sand, bricks and iron etc to make a start on her house.

loans.name: Đường

texts.en:
Mrs. Đường works in agriculture farming food. Đường has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Đường is 61 years old, and she is married with three children. Đường lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Đường's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Đường faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Đường hopes to remodel her house, and to buy a motorbike. She hopes for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel es una mujer de 32 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hio varón de 4 años, y su negocio es la confección de ropa.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, buena madre, constante, responsable y trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona ’16 de julio’ un área caracterizada por el comercio informal en todas las áreas, donde se dice que se puede encontrar desde una aguja para coser hasta un tractor para arar. De clima frío y seco (2ºC -12ºC), a una altura promedio de 3800 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Isabel es de tez morena, cabello negro largo trenzado, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Aymará que es muy hablada en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte junto a su hijo que aún no está en edad escolar. Viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable, gas, alcantarillado y electricidad. Su trabajo es la confección de ropa femenina, como; brasier, pijamas, pantys, Uniformes Femeninos y otros. Sus inicios fueron como ayudante de costura, posteriormente junto a su pareja se independizaron. Actualmente vende ropa por mayor a clientes de otras ciudades y la demanda del sector la obliga a necesitar una máquina collareta para doble costura; “comencé porque mis hermanos me enseñaron el oficio, luego con mi pareja compramos una máquina industrial y ahora necesito una collareta…” comenta. Su sueño es trabajr con su pareja y ampliar su negocio mediante la confección de variedades de prendas. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamo con la institución en 6 años que viene realizando esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Isabel solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina de coser collareta para mejorar sus creaciones.
texts.en:
Isabel, a 32-year-old woman, lives with her partner, they have a 4-year-old son, and her business is sewing clothing. 

She is enterprising, independent, a good mother, dependable, responsible, and hard-working. Her work is located in the "16 de julio" zone, an area characterized by informal commerce in all areas, where they say you can find everything from a sewing needle to a tractor for plowing.  The climate is cold and dry (2ºC -12ºC), at an average altitude of 3800 meters above sea level. 

Isabel has olive skin, long braided black hair, is short, her native language is Aymará which is very commonly spoken in this place, and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and for the business she does. She shares her live with her son who is not of school age yet. They live in their own house build of brick which has drinking water, gas, sewer and electricity. Her work is sewing women's clothing such as bras, pajamas, panties, women's uniforms and others. Her beginnings were as an assistant seamstress, later, with her partner, they became independent. Currently, she sells clothing in bulk to customers in other cities and the demand of this sector makes a collar sewing machine necessary to double the sewing. "I began because my siblings taught me the trade, later with my partner, we bought an industrial machine, and now I need a collar sewing machine..." she says. Her dream is to work with her partner and expand her business through sewing a variety of clothing. This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the 6 years that she has been doing this work independently. 

For these reasons, Isabel is asking for a loan to purchase a collar sewing machine to improve her creations.

loans.use: to purchase a collar sewing machine to improve her creations.

loans.name: Huế

texts.en:
Huế works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Huế has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Huế is 27 years old, and she is married with three children. Huế lives with her three dependents in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Huế's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Huế faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Huế hopes to maintain a successful business, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Hồng

texts.en:
Mrs. Hồng works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Hồng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Hồng is 24 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Hồng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hồng has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Hồng faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Hồng hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her business to do well. She also hopes for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Liezel

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Liezel works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Liezel is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Liezel has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Unidas; está en su ciclo número  1  del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo, en el cual todas y cada una de ellas están contentas por formar parte de este grupo, el cual les será de mucha ayuda. 
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Beronica; quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de la venta de comidas que hace, esta teniendo los medios para poder ayudar a su familia, es muy trabajadora y luchadora, que se esfuerza siempre al máximo.
Pide este préstamo con el cual podrá comprar insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, carnes, condimentos y demás. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
The group Mujeres Unidas is in its first loan cycle in the women's committee program. It is a new group in which each and every one of them is happy to be part of the group, which will be a great help to them. 

One of the members is Beronica, who, through her efforts and continuous work and through the sale of foods that she makes, has the means to be able to help her family. She is very hardworking and determined, and always puts out her best effort. 

She asks for this loan with which she will be able to purchase items to be able to make her dishes such as vegetables, meats, seasonings, and more. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is getting to continue with her work.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meats, seasonings and more.

loans.name: Belgica Aida

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Estrellitas se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Bélgica tiene 42 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene 3  hijos, dos de ellos ya mayores de edad y el menor de 11 años de edad el cual  estudian en escuela, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa. Su marido es cocinero de un barco.
Doña Belgica es una mujer  muy trabajadora que siempre le gusto ganar su propios ingresos y con estos salir adelante con su familia, ella se dedica al comercio en lo que es la venta de zapatillas y productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella visita a sus clientes en sus ratos mas desocupados,  deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, lleva varios años realizando esta actividad.
Este crédito es para comprar zapatillas, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y todo de lo que ella vende. Este es su segundo ciclo en el Grupo de crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella sale adelante. Sus sueños son seguir adelante mejorando cada día su negocio.
texts.en:
The Las Estrellitas communal bank meets every 15 days in the city of Manta.  The city is known for its beautiful beaches, which are extremely popular during all seasons of the year. It is a city of incomparable beauty with a lot of tourist attractions.

This is where Bélgica, age 42, lives.  She is in a common-law marriage, and she has three children.  Two of them are adults, and the youngest is 11 years old and goes to school.  Two of them still lives in her house.  Her husband is a cook on a boat.

Bélgica is a very hard-working woman who always likes to earn her own income.  She uses this to get ahead with her family.  She works in commerce, and she sells slippers and Yanbal (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and women’s accessories).  She sells door to door.  She visits her customers in the times when they are least busy.  She sells for credit, and she collects every eight days.  She has been engaged in this business activity for several years.

This loan is to buy slippers, perfume, creams, cosmetics, and everything that she sells.  It is her second loan cycle with the communal bank.  She likes the communal bank because she gets ahead with the loans.  Her dream is to continue improving her business every day.

loans.use: to buy slippers, perfume, creams, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Haykush

texts.en:
Haykush lives with her husband (in the photo) and their son in the village of Lusashogh in the Ararat region. Their only occupation is agriculture. They keep a stable of livestock, including cows, calves and hens, and they cultivate wheat and tomatoes. 

A very hardworking farmer, Haykush wants to enlarge her farm. She asks for this loan to to purchase two mother pigs and forage for her cattle as well as wood to renovate the barn.

She hopes for lenders’ support as it will be a big help in further developing her farm.

loans.use: to purchase two mother pigs and forage for her cattle as well as wood to renovate the barn.

loans.name: Bình

texts.en:
Bình works in agriculture farming food. Bình has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Bình is 36 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Bình's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Bình faces in her life is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Bình hopes for her children to do well in school, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge tiene 20 años de edad y habita junto a sus padres y hermanos en casa familiar. Jorge es un joven trabajador quien trabaja en una institución cercana a su localidad. Él es muy conocido en su zona como una persona honrada y responsable. Jorge ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea terminar de construir su vivienda. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ventanas, puertas, cemento, grava, arena y ladrillo para colocar las respectivas puertas y ventanas, encementar el piso y construir el baño sanitario. Espera poder mejorar sus condiciones y las de su familia.
texts.en: Jorge is 20 years old and lives with his parents and siblings in the family house. Jorge is a hard-working young man who works in an institution near his locality. He is very well-known in his area as an honest and responsible person. Jorge has decided to ask FUSAI for this loan due to his desire to finish building his house. For this reason, he asks FUSAI for this loan to invest in windows, doors, cement, gravel, sand, and bricks to install these doors and windows, cement the floor and build a bathroom. He hopes to be able to improve his conditions and those of his family. zo

loans.use: to purchase windows, doors, cement, gravel, sand, and bricks to install these doors and windows, cement the floor and build a bathroom.

loans.name: Dư

texts.en:
Dư works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Dư has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Dư is 56 years old and she is married with two children. Dư lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Dưs first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
 
One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Dư hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hạnh

texts.en:
Mrs. Hạnh works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Hạnh has been involved in this business for five years.

Hạnh is 42 years old, and she is married with 2 children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hạnh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Hạnh faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Hạnh hopes to maintain a successful business, and to make enough money to provide for her kids. She also hopes for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase fishing net, gasoline, etc for her fishing business.

Lolita has been in this business for 22 years. Lolita earns more income from raising pigs.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net, gasoline, etc

loans.name: Quý

texts.en:
Mrs. Quý operates a food stall/restaurant selling shrimp. Quý has been involved in this business for eight years.

Quý is 31 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Quý's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Quý faces in her life is low profit margins. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Quý hopes to maintain a successful business, and to buy land of her own.  She also hopes for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hà

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. Hà has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Hà is 40 years old, and she is married with three children. Hà lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hà has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Hà faces in her life is not having money to repair the latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Hà hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to maintain a successful business. She hopes for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Diễn

texts.en:
Mrs. Diễn operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. Diễn has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Diễn is 38 years old, and she is married with three children. Diễn lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Diễn joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Diễn has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having money to repair the latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Diễn hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Nga

texts.en:
Mrs. Nga operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. Nga has been involved in this business for five years.

Nga is 25 years old and she is married with two children. Nga lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Nga's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Nga faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Nga hopes to build a new house, and for her children to find good jobs. She hopes for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Esilda

texts.es:
Esilda una imponente morena, preocupada por su familia que en vista de que su pareja no da abasto con los gastos familiares decidió acudir a un entidad que confiara en ella para que le prestara dinero e iniciar su propio negocio de cría de animales, cerdos y pollos.
Decidió iniciar su negocio puesto que de pequeña fue criada en este ambiente y por ello confía en que tendrá éxito y pensando en el bienestar familiar pide su ayuda para iniciar formalmente y promete cumplimiento en las cuotas pues sabe que le darán la oportunidad de luchar por mejorar las condiciones de vida de los suyos.
texts.en:
Esilda is an impressive black woman, concerned for her family who, in light of her partner not giving help with the family expenses, decided to approach an entity that trusts in her so that they will loan her money and to begin her own business raising animals, pigs and chickens. 

She decided to start her own business because when she was young she was raised in this environment and, for that reason, she trusts she will have success. Thinking of her family's well-being, she asks for your help to formally start and she promises to make the payments since she knows that it will give her the opportunity to fight to improve her loved ones' living conditions.

loans.use: to start her business raising pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
Magdalena is 59 years old, married, and has four children.  

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Magdalena requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Magdalena has been pig fattening for 10 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Magdalena would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Ángela Esperanza

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Estrellitas se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Ángela, tiene 46 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen siete hijos, cinco mayores de edad y dos de  16 y 10 años, los tres menores estudian en universidad, colegio y escuela y son los que aun viven con ellos. Su esposo es pintor.
Doña Ángela es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos se dedica al comercio, ella vende ropa de todo tipo productos de Belcorp y Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta ella trabaja dos a tres horas al día ya sea en la mañana o en horas de la noche, la mayoría de sus productos son para entregar ya que cuenta con mucha clientela, ella deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, lleva más de 4   años en esta actividad la cual le permite ganarse lo suyo.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, perfumes, cremas, cosméticos entre otras cosas que vende. Este es su quinto ciclo en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The Las Estrellitas communal bank meets every 15 days in the city of Manta.  The city is known for its beautiful beaches, which are visited a lot during every season of the year.  It is also known for being a city of incomparable beauty with many tourist attractions.

This is where Ángela, age 46, lives.  She is married, and they have seven children.  Five of them are grown.  The other two are 16 and 10.  The three youngest go to the university, high school, and elementary school.  They are the ones that still live with her.  Her husband is a painter.

Ángela is a housewife who, in order to get her own resources and help her husband with the expenses, sells clothes and all types of Belcorp and Yanbal products (beauty products, perfume, and women’s accessories).  She sells door to door, and she works two or three hours a day either in the morning or in the evening hours.  Most of her products are to be delivered, and she has a lot of customers.  She sells on credit and collects every eight days.  She has been engaged in this business activity, which allows her to earn on her own, for over four years.

This loan is to buy clothes, perfume, creams, cosmetics, and other things that she sells.  This is her fifth cycle with the communal bank.  She likes the bank because of the help provided by the loans.  Her dream is to give her family the best.

loans.use: to buy clothes, perfume, creams, cosmetics, and other things that she sells.

loans.name: Jhonatan

texts.es: Jhonatan es un joven de 25 años de edad, padre de una niña de tan solo 3 años y hoy se encuentra preocupado al no tener un empleo para darle a su hija lo que necesita como comida, medicamentos, vestimenta o incluso un techo, por ello por el consejo de un amigo iniciara su negocio informal de venta de calzado y ropa la cual le ofertara a amigos, vecinos e ira puerta a puerta lo que sea para cumplir el sueño de tener los recursos suficientes para darle a su hija lo necesario para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Jhonatan is a young man of 25 and father of a little girl who's only three.

He's unemployed, and concerned about being able to provide for his daughter's basic needs such as food, medicine, clothes or even a roof to live under.

Following the advice of a friend, he will start a business selling clorhing and shoes that he will offer to friends, neighbors, and others as ambulant vendor, selling door to door.

He is committed to realizing the dream of generating income to support his daughter.

loans.use: to start selling clothing,  to provide a future for his daughter.

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina lives with her husband, parents-in-law and son in Shaqe village, Syuniq region. Their family has been involved in a farming business for more than 15 years.
  
Irina’s husband is an army officer, and other family members help Irina with running a farm. They keep a cow, calves, sheep, and hens, and cultivate emmer wheat, potato and grass. To enlarge their farm with eight sheep and purchase fodder for livestock, Irina has applied for this loan.
 
As this is Irina’s first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to purchase eight sheep and purchase fodder for livestock

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
10 kilometers from the rural town of Kapsowar, Kenya, you meet an ever-smiling Paul, a father of three who belongs to the smallholder category. The village of Kapkawer, where Paul resides, has largely stayed under-developed, with farmers persistently following traditional cultivation practices and mostly preferring to cultivate maize and mangoes.

Paul has been practicing dairy farming, disrupting the traditional practice of cultivating bananas with an objective to improve his socio-economic status. The prevailing geological conditions of the village make it extremely suitable for dairy farming. The major challenge he faces is a lack of funds to push his dairy farming a notch higher.

He is requesting a loan from Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva lenders to buy a quality breed of dairy cow. The additional cow will help in the use of pasture, and will increase milk production and availability to produce more byproducts. Through this loan, Paul will be able to challenge the existing norms and bring better and advanced dairy farming practices to his village, thus becoming a torchbearer for change in his village for others to follow. He hopes that he will be able to use your loan investment wisely to raise his family's standard of living.

Don't let that smile dim! Your support will help Paul to share his good energy with every client that stops by asking for his milk products.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Liana

texts.en:
Liana lives in Masis town with her husband and four children. Liana and her family keep livestock and cultivate land. They have three cows, six pigs and twenty-four piglets on their farm.

To enlarge her farm, Liana asks lenders to support her. She wants to purchase two more cows for her farm. This will enable her to get more meat and milk and gather profit from its sale.

loans.use: to purchase two more cows for her farm

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es: Enrique tiene 38 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Chojasivi, se gana la vida vendiendo leche, se levanta desde muy temprano, la ventaja es su edad que no le permite agotarse rapidamente como pasa con otros hombres en este rubro que inclusive han entrado a la tercera edad Enrique quiere un credito para  comprar una motobomba electrica A futuro Enrique quisiera incrementar las cabezas de ganado que tiene, de esa manera podra brindarle un mejor futuro a su esposa y a sus 3 hijos
texts.en: Enrique is 38 and lives in the Chojasivi community. He makes a living selling milk. He gets up very early. The advantage is his age, which means that he doesn't get tired early like some of the men who work in this business and are elderly. Enrique would like a loan for the purchase of an electric pump. In the future Enrique would like to have more cattle in order to provide a better future for his wife and three children.

loans.use: to buy an electric pump.

loans.name: La Flor Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado La flor forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, el cual les permitirá conocer la situación de vida de cada una de ellas, y conforme a ello poder trabajar y superar la situación de pobreza de cada una.
Integra este grupo la Sra. Isidora, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que esta en una pobreza extrema. Isidora se dedica a la venta de bolsones varios, y por medio de su pequeño negocio se va abriendo camino. Ella es una mujer emprendedora, creativa y es capaz de emprender un negocio y tener éxito.  A parte de las capacitaciones correspondientes y de los seguimientos también recibe un plan de negocios para poder mejorar su situación.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar bolsones varios, de manera a poder seguir con su emprendimiento, y seguir luchando por su meta.
texts.en:
The group called La Flor (The Flower) is part of the elimination of poverty program, which helps each member understand her life situation in order to lift herself out of poverty. 

Isidora is a member of the group and the results of the survey showed her to be in level one - extreme poverty. Isidora sells different kinds of of tote bags, and with her small business she is beginning to make her way. She is a creative, enterprising woman who is capable of starting a business and becoming successful. In addition to the training she receives as part of the program, she also receives a business plan to improve her situation.

She is asking for this loan so she can buy a variety of tote bags to keep her business running and to keep fighting to attain her goal.

loans.use: to buy tote bags for resale.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
Rita es de la ciudad de Pilar, es una persona que se esta esforzando por poder ser alguien en la vida, una persona profesional que se abra camino en la vida, él comenta que su préstamo anterior de kiva lo uso para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, y así poder cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
Hoy pide nuevamente de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar la totalidad de sus gastos de titulación, de manera a cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
texts.en:
Rita is from the city of Pilar. She is a person who is working hard to become someone in life. She is working for a professional life. She says that she used her previous loan on Kiva to cover her tuition costs.
Today she is requesting a new loan to invest in paying the rest of her tuition in order to cover this cost.

loans.use: to pay tuition costs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Sara Elizabeth

texts.es: Sara tiene 38 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 17 años, 13 años y 11 años de edad. Ella se gana la vida mediante la elaboración de tortillas desde hace mucho tiempo. Sara es una mujer muy dedicada a su familia y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro y láminas dado que desea dar inicio a la construcción de un pequeño cuarto. ESpera poder contar con este financiamiento.
texts.en:
Sara is 38 years old and lives in a house of her own with her husband and her three children, ages 17, 13, and 11. She has been working making tortillas for a long time. She is a dedicated mother and wife who sustains the family with the help of her husband.

Thinking of improving their living conditions, Sara is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron bars and metal sheets in order to build a small room. She hopes to receive this loan.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron bars and metal sheets to build a room.

loans.name: Vân

texts.en:
Vân operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. Vân has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Vân faces in her life is not having money to build a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

Vân is 39 years old, and she is married with two children. Vân lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Vân joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Vân has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. With her business profit, Vân hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 5 windows for her home.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Marilou works hard to support her family.

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Marilou is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy additional ingredients like canned goods, meat, vegetables, eggs, spices, etc. for her restaurant business.

Marilou has been sustaining her business activities through her past 15 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of repairing and renovating her family home.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients like canned goods, meat, vegetables, eggs, spices, etc.

loans.name: Sergio Manuel

texts.es:
Sergio es un humilde trabajador, del campo que se ocupa de los gastos del hogar que lo conforman sus 5 hijos, su señora, sus animales y su campo de verdad se ocupada demasiado y trabaja para mantenerlos a todos bien. 
Al tener tantas obligaciones el dinero no siente es suficiente y en el momento presenta un déficit y no tiene como comprar los abonos, semillas, riegos, pesticidas, insecticidas, larvicidas que necesita para sus cultivos, por ello solicita un crédito para comprar estos insumos tan costosos en el mercado y seguir manteniendo a todo su familia dignamente
texts.en:
Sergio is a humble man who works the fields to cover his household costs. He has five children and a wife, and also must care for his animals and field. He really has too much to take care of and works to maintain everyone well.
Because he has so many obligations, the money is not enough. He has a deficit and no way to buy the manure, seeds, irrigation, pesticides, insecticides, larvicides that he needs for his crops. For this reason he is requesting a loan to buy these expensive supplies at the market in order to keep maintaining his family in a dignified manner.

loans.use: to buy larvicide, insecticide, manure, and irrigation.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel tiene 55 años y vive en la comunidad de Chojasivi Daniel se dedica a la produccion de leche, Daniel cuida su ganando con mucho esfuerzo Daniel quiere un credito para comprar un molino  motor  que le ayude en la extraccion de agua para su ganado A futuro a Daniel le gustaria tener mas ganado Daniel esta casado y es un orgulloso padre de 3 hijos
texts.en: Daniel is 55 and lives in the Chojasivi community.  He produces milk. He cares for his livestock very carefully. He would like a loan to purchase a motorized mill to help him extract water for his livestock. In the future he would like to have more livestock. He is married and a proud father of three.

loans.use: to buy a motorized mill.

loans.name: Karen Rocio

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Las Estrellitas se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Karen, tiene 25 años de edad, es madre soltera tiene un  hijo de 10 meses de nacido el cual es el motor de su vida. Ella vive en casa de sus padres. 
Doña Karen es joven madre que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder darle lo necesario a su bebé se dedica al comercio, ella vende ropa y zapatos por catalogo. Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta ella aprovecha para salir en las  mañanas ya que a esa hora su mamá le cuida al bebé aunque también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, ella deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, lleva más de 2  años en esta actividad con la cual se gana lo suyo que le sirve para sacar adelante a su bebé.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa y zapatos. Lleva 4 ciclos en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos sale adelante. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su hijo.
texts.en:
Las Estrellitas Loan Group meet every 2 weeks in the city of Manta, well-known for both its beautiful beaches which receive lots of visitors year-round and its incomparable beauty and many tourist attractions. 

This is where Karen lives. She's a 25-year old single mother of her 10-month old son who is the light of her life. She lives in her parents' house. 

Karen is a young mother who sells clothes and shoes by catalogue so she can make her own income to meet her baby's needs. She sells door-to-door, going out in the mornings to take advantage of the fact that her mother can look after her baby. She also sells products in her house to her most well-known clients who buy on credit and then she charges them every 8 days. 

She has been running her business for over 2 years and has been making a living to support her baby. 

She will use this loan to buy clothes and shoes. This is her 4th loan cycle in the group and she likes it because you get the loans upfront. Her dream is to provide the very best for son.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
Soledad tiene 50 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge e hijos en el distrito de Zaña, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. La mayoría de los habitantes de este distrito se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, pollo y abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros, cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El presente crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos como verduras, arroz, aceite, azúcar, entre otros para aumentar el stock de su negocio. Con esto Soledad espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes satisfaciendo sus gustos y preferencias lo que le generará mayores ingresos que le permitirán mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Soledad is 50 years old and is in a common-law relationship. She lives in her own house with her spouse and children in the district of Zaña, located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the North Coast of Peru. The majority of inhabitants of this district work in agriculture and raising animals.

She works selling vegetables, chickens and groceries like rice, sugar and oil amongst others. She has experience in the business and has regular clients who offer very good personal and labor references for her. This loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of products like vegetables, rice, oil and sugar amongst others to increase the stock of her business. Doing this Soledad hopes to offer a greater variety of products to her clients satisfying their tastes and preferences to generate more income which would allow her to improve the quality of living for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of products like vegetables, rice, oil and sugar amongst others to increase the stock of her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics and threads in bulk.

loans.name: Sen

texts.en:
Mrs. Sen operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. Sen has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Sen faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

Sen is 36 years old, and she is married with three children. Sen lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Sen's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. With her business profit, Sen hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Trabajadoras De Curupayty Group

texts.es:
El grupo Trabajadoras de Curupayty está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas también forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas quieren conocer su realidad y de esa forma ir mejorando.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Valentina , quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres., lo que quiere decir que ha ido superando su pobreza extrema. Ella se dedica a la cría de cerdos, un trabajo sacrificado que viene haciendo y con el cual ayuda a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de balanceados para sus cerdos, lo cual le será util para poder seguir con la cría que ella venia haciendo.
texts.en:
The Curupayty Group of workers are in their sixth cycle of the women's committee programme. They are also part of a programme to eliminate poverty, in which everyone wants to recognise their own realities and then work to improve them. 

One of the members of the group is Mrs Valentina, who in the last questionnaire was assessed as living at poverty level three, which indicates that she has improved her level of extreme poverty. 

She makes a living breeding pigs, selfless work which she has been doing to support her family. 

She is requesting a loan to buy pig feed for her pigs which will be useful for her so she can continue breeding.

loans.use: to buy pig feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Liên

texts.en:
Liên works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Liên has been involved in this business for eight years.

The main hardship that Liên faces in her life is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

Liên is 28 years old, and she is married with two children. Liên lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Liên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Liên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Lương

texts.en:
Mrs. Lương has a retail business selling medication. Lương has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Lương faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

Lương is 32 years old, and she is married with two children. Lương lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2008, Lương joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Lương has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Lương hopes to maintain a successful business, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Thốn

texts.en:
Thốn is 53 years old and she is married with four children. She lives with no dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Thốn operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

In 2007, Thốn joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Thốn faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Thốn hopes to maintain a successful business, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Jonah

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Jonah, a 31-year-old father of one adorable child who always brings a pleasant feeling when he is at home. He hails from the Kitale area of Kenya, an area that is the bread basket of Kenya because half the food Kenya consumes comes from this area.

Being a father comes with lots of responsibility, and feeding his family and siblings requires a lot of hard work; hence, Jonah has to put in extra efforts to comfortably take care of his family. Jonah started farming just after finishing high school since he never advanced his education. Because of the high unemployment rate, he ventured into farming, and he has never regretted this because of the profits he has been making.

Jonah practices mixed farming and is regarded as one of the hardworking farmers in his village because he is able to juggle between keeping dairy cows and also doing crop farming. Jonah is a visionary and an enterprising person and has always wanted to do dairy farming on a large scale, but one of the challenges he has faced is lack of enough capital. That is why he is kindly seeking a loan to buy a dairy cow.

Through the loan Jonah is confident that his life will be transformed and his dream of providing a secure future for his children will be achieved. Jonah is relieved to know that his life can be secured through partners such as Kiva lenders who help small-scale and aspiring men such as Jonah.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras Del Barrio San Antonio Group

texts.es:
Teresa (representante que aparece al lado derecho de la foto) es una mujer muy optimista, le gusta apoyar a su familia, ella se casó de muy temprana edad tiene ahora 26 años y tiene dos hijos uno de 7 años y otro de un año y cinco meses., vive junto a su familia en una comunidad de Sololá.
